T02D2693:297b-3: yid la zung shig / mchod par gyis shig /

T02D2693:297b-15: sgra gcan zin zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2693:297b-16: sgra gcan zin gyi rkyen gyis sems can gyi don la /

T02D2693:297b-18: be con chen po'i gzugs kyi rig sngags 'di /

T02D2693:297b-26: ba ni / cad 'joms pa / ba'o // gsung ba gsung bar 'gyur pa zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2693:297b-27: 'das pa rnams kyis kyang gsungs pa'o //
T02D2693:297b-28: ma 'ongs pa rnams gyis kyang gsungs te /

T02D2693:297b-33: thun mong gi dngos grub kyang 'grub ste /

T02D2693:297b-35: thun mong gi dngos grub ni /
T02D2693:297b-36: 'jig rten 'di'i sa la spyod pa dang /
T02D2693:297b-37: nam mkha' la spyod pa dang sa'i 'og na spyod pa'o //
T02D2693:297b-38: de la sogs pa phra mo'i dngos grub kyang yod de /
T02D2693:298a-0: @298a * // de yang zhi ba dang rgyas pa dang dbang dang mngon spyod la sogs pa'o //
T02D2693:298a-1: thun mong ma yin pa'i dngos grub ni /

T02D2693:298a-4: srid pa ma yin 'das pa yang ma yin te /
T02D2693:298a-5: da ltar yod pa yang ma yin no //

T02D2693:298a-7: gzhan gyis mi thub pa ni 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal gyis mi thub ste /
T02D2693:298a-8: de bzhin du gdon la sogs pas kyang mi thub pa'o //
T02D2693:298a-16: lto 'phye la sogs pas bstod pa zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2693:298a-17: rig sngags 'di la rtag tu rjes su yi rang ste /
T02D2693:298a-18: mchod par byas shing rig sngags kyi rgyal mo'i bka' las mi 'da'o //
T02D2693:298a-19: 'byung po'i tshogs thams cad kyis yongs su bzung ba ste zhes bya ba ni /

T02D2693:298a-22: de rnams kyang srung bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2693:298a-23: rtag tu 'byung po rnams kyis phyag 'tshal zhing rjes su yi rang ba'o //
T02D2693:298a-24: bdag dang sems can thams cad gnod pa thams cad
T02D2693:298a-25: las bde legs su gyur cig ces bya ba ni
T02D2693:298a-26: / tshe dang ldan pa gzhon nu sgra gcan zin gyis kyang /
T02D2693:298a-27: rig sngags 'di lus la btags bar byas so //
T02D2693:298a-28: yid la bzung zhing kha ton du byas so ;
T02D2693:298a-30: gzhan gyis mi thub pa rig sngags kyi go cha
T02D2693:298a-31: gon nas gti mug la sogs pa dug lnga bor
T02D2693:298a-32: te / dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu bsgrub par dur
T02D2693:298a-33: khrod bsil ba'i tshal 'jigs su rung ba'i nang du

T02D2693:298a-35: nad med pa dang 'jigs pa med par gyur cig ces bya ba ni /
T02D2693:298a-37: lha ma yin gyi gdon rnams dang /
T02D2693:298a-39: gnod sbyin gyi gdon rnams dang /

T02D2693:298b-3: mi ma yin gyi gdon rnams dang /
T02D2693:298b-5: yi dags kyi gdon rnams dang /
T02D2693:298b-8: grul bum gyi gdon rnams dang /

T02D2693:298b-17: tshe dang ldan pa gzhon nu sgra gcan zin yang dgra bcom pa yang dag pa thob cing /
T02D2693:298b-22: sems can thams cad byang chub kyi lam la 'jug pa'o //
T02D2693:298b-23: rig sngags kyi rgyal mo bsil ba'i tshal gyis /
T02D2693:298b-24: gzhon nu sgra gcan zin gyi gdon 'dul ba'i gnas skabs te gsum pa'o //
T02D2693:298b-25: rig sngags kyi snying po brtag pa dang po rdzogs so /
T02D2693:298b-27: // / de nas rgyal po chen po lus ngan po dang /
T02D2693:298b-30: 'phags skyes po bu dang bcas pa zhes bya ba ni /

T02D2693:298b-32: dri za'i rgyal po stong phrag nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang /
T02D2693:298b-33: grul bum gyi rgyal po stong phrag nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang /
T02D2693:298b-34: klu'i rgyal po stong phrag nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang bcas pa /
T02D2693:298b-35: de bzhin du bu dang yang bcas pa'o //
T02D2693:298b-40: g-yog 'khor dang bcas zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2693:298b-44: klu stong phrag nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang /
T02D2693:298b-46: de bzhin du chung ma dang /
T02D2693:298b-48: tsha bo dang yang tsha bo la sogs pa dang thabs cig tu'o //
T02D2693:298b-49: kha dog 'phags pa dag nam phyed na lhags nas /
T02D2693:298b-50: gros mthun par dur khrod chen po bsil ba'i tshal du dong ste zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2693:298b-51: bcom ldan 'das kyang bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri nas /
T02D2693:299a-0: sems can gyi don la 'khor bzhi po dag dang bcas @299a * //
T02D2693:299a-1: shing 'jigs su rung ba bsil ba'i tshal gyi nang du phyin nas zhugs so //
T02D2693:299a-2: de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag 'khor
T02D2693:299a-3: dang bcas pa rnams kyang so so rang rang gi

T02D2693:299a-10: brjid kyi so so rang rang gi rang bzhin mthu'i
T02D2693:299a-12: bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2693:299a-22: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te /
T02D2693:299a-23: lan gsum bskor ba byas te thal mo sbyar te zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2693:299a-24: rgyal po chen po bzhi dang 'khor de dag rnams
T02D2693:299a-25: dang bcas shing bcom ldan 'das la gus par byas
T02D2693:299a-26: nas so so rang rang gi me tog dang spos
T02D2693:299a-27: la sogs pas mchod par byas so //
T02D2693:299a-28: bcom ldan 'das 'ba' zhig la phyag 'tshal zhing phyogs gcig tu 'khod do zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2693:299a-29: bcom ldan 'das la lus ngag yid gsum gyis gus par byas nas /
T02D2693:299a-30: yang dang yang nga phyag 'tshal te /
T02D2693:299a-31: de rnams kyang thabs cig tu 'khod pa'o //
T02D2693:299a-33: rgyal po chen po bzhis bcom ldan 'das la tshegs su bcad pas bstod pa zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2693:299a-34: de rnams kyis kyang dbyangs gcig skad cig tu byas nas bcom ldan 'das la gus par byas pa'o //
T02D2693:299a-35: 'jig rten mkhas pa rdzogs sangs rgyas //
T02D2693:299a-36: dpa' chen khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2693:299a-38: chos kyi rang bzhin dbyer med pa /
T02D2693:299a-39: ngo bo nyid dang bral ba'i chos sku dang sgyu
T02D2693:299a-40: ma lta bu'i rang bzhin me long gi gzugs brnyan
T02D2693:299a-42: longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku dang ldan pa dang ngo //
T02D2693:299b-0: mtshan bzang po sum @299b cu rtsa gnyis dang /
T02D2693:299b-1: dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu dang ldan zhing /
T02D2693:299b-2: sems can gyi don la stong gsum gyi stong chen
T02D2693:299b-3: po'i 'jig rten gyi khams la sprul pa'i skus khyab
T02D2693:299b-4: pa'o // sbrul pa'i sku de yang dpa' ba dang
T02D2693:299b-5: zhing bdud bzhi bcom pa la stobs dang ldan te
T02D2693:299b-6: pa'o // / bag chags dang shes bya'i sgrib pas ma gos shing /
T02D2693:299b-7: nyon mongs pa lnga bcom zhing /
T02D2693:299b-9: de bzhin nyid du ldan pa'i sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal zhing 'dud pa'o //
T02D2693:299b-10: goo ta ma khyod kyis gang mkhyen pa //
T02D2693:299b-11: de ni lha rnams ma 'tshal to //
T02D2693:299b-13: chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong sems can gyi don la thugs la gzung ba /
T02D2693:299b-14: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams la skad cig mas khyab pa /
T02D2693:299b-15: sems can lta ba mi gcig pa rnams la so so rang rang gi chos ston pa ste /
T02D2693:299b-16: de lta bu'i sangs rgyas la 'jig rten dag gis mi 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'o //
T02D2693:299b-17: lan gnyis lan gsum du yang rgyal po chen po bzhis /
T02D2693:299b-18: bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pas bstod pa zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2693:299b-19: lan dang po 'bul ba ni chos sku'i rang bzhin gnyis su med pa'i sku ste /
T02D2693:299b-20: bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs la dbul ba'o //
T02D2693:299b-21: lan gnyis pa ni sgyu ma lta bu'i rang bzhin gyi ste /
T02D2693:299b-22: longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku yin te /
T02D2693:299b-23: bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung la 'bul ba'o //

T02D2693:299b-25: stong gsum la skad cig mas sprul pa'i skus khyab ste /

T02D2693:299b-28: dpa' chen khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //

T02D2693:300a-1: * // la yang dag pa'i byang chub thob par 'gyur ro //
T02D2693:300a-2: lha'i bdud la sogs pa bcom zhing /

T02D2693:300a-4: de lta bu'i rang bzhin du sh'akya'i bu sangs rgyas te /
T02D2693:300a-5: goo ta ma'i rigs su skyes pa yang dag par
T02D2693:300a-6: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sh'akya seng ge la phyag 'tshal
T02D2693:300a-8: goo ta ma khyod kyis gang mkhyen pa //
T02D2693:300a-9: de ni lha rnams ma 'tshal to //
T02D2693:300a-11: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sh'akya thub pas mkhyen pa /
T02D2693:300a-12: lha rnams kyis ci smos zhes te /
T02D2693:300a-13: rgya mtsho'i nang na nor yod pa bzhin du'o //
T02D2693:300a-14: rgyal po bzhi la sogs pas bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa'o //
T02D2693:300a-15: de nas zhes bya ba ni rgyal po bzhis bstod pa'i de nas so //
T02D2693:300a-16: bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po chen po bzhis 'di skad ces gsol te zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2693:300a-17: bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar zhu ba dbul ba'o ;
T02D2693:300a-18: / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das yul dang spro lags sam /
T02D2693:300a-19: 'tsho ba dang ldan lags sam zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2693:300a-20: bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor bzhi po de dag kyang bde bar gnas sam zhes bya ba'o //
T02D2693:300a-21: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi sku bde lags sam /
T02D2693:300a-23: nyam nga bam mchis sam zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2693:300a-24: bdud bzhi po rnams kyis bar du mchod dam /

T02D2693:300a-27: gnod pa mi mnga' lags sam zhes bya ba ni
T02D2693:300a-28: ma rungs pa bdud bzhi'i rigs kyi 'byung po rnams
T02D2693:300a-29: kyis chos la bar chod ma byas sam zhes bya
T02D2693:300a-30: ba'o // bcom ldan 'das la gnod sbyin dang zhes

T02D2693:300a-32: ba'o // byed cing / sems can rnams la gnod par byed pa rnams yin te /
T02D2693:300a-33: yid mi bde bar byed pa yang de rnams yin te /
T02D2693:300a-34: lus lan tsha drag pos thebs par byed pa yang de yin no //

T02D2693:300a-40: thebs nas 'chi ba dang shi ro dang skyes nas

T02D2693:300b-1: mngal du zhugs pa'i dus su yang gzi brjid 'phrog cing /
T02D2693:300b-2: skyes pa dang bud med kyi tshogs kyang 'jigs par byed pa'o //
T02D2693:300b-3: chung ba la 'ju ba ni ba spu'i rtse mo brgya stong tsam gnas zhes bya ba'o //
T02D2693:300b-4: che ba ni ri rab bas kyang che ste /
T02D2693:300b-5: stobs btang na ri rab kyang 'gul lo //

T02D2693:300b-8: rims drag po dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa
T02D2693:300b-9: ni nad bzhi brgya brgyad cu de las 'du ba
T02D2693:300b-10: yin te ; nad de rnams kyang mi mnga' 'am zhes pa'o //
T02D2693:300b-11: mi dang mi ma yin pa sdang bar sems pa dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
T02D2693:300b-12: rkun po dang mi rgod dang rgyal po la sogs pa yin te /
T02D2693:300b-13: mi dang mi ma yin pa ni ma rungs pa'i
T02D2693:300b-14: sdig can gyi rigs sems can la 'tshe bar byed
T02D2693:300b-15: pa rnams so // de rnams kyis kyang gnod pa ma byas sam zhes bya'o //
T02D2693:300b-16: de skad ces gsol pa dang zhes bya ba ni
T02D2693:300b-17: bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po bzhis snyun gsol ba'o
T02D2693:300b-18: // bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po chen po bzhi
T02D2693:300b-19: la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to zhes bya ba
T02D2693:300b-20: // ni / bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po chen
T02D2693:300b-21: po bzhi las snyun gsol ba ni lan bka' stsal
T02D2693:300b-22: // ni / pa'o // kye rgyal po chen po
T02D2693:300b-23: dag nga la ni thams cad yod de zhes bya
T02D2693:300b-24: // ni / pa'o // ba ni / rgya mtsho lta bu ste /
T02D2693:300b-25: de'i nang na rin po che sna tshogs zad mi
T02D2693:300b-26: shes pa yod pa bzhin du ngal yang de bzhin
T02D2693:300b-31: nyam nga ba yang med do zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2693:300b-32: mngon sum du 'khor phun sum tshogs pa yang de bzhin te /
T02D2693:300b-33: dang po phung po'i bdud bcom pa ste //
T02D2693:300b-35: de bzhin du gsum pa 'chi bdag gi bdud bcom pa ste /
T02D2693:300b-36: bzhi pa lha'i bu'i bdud bcom pa'o //
T02D2693:300b-37: de bas nyam ming ba zhes bya ba'o //
T02D2693:300b-38: kye rgyal po chen po dag nga'i lus la ni
T02D2693:300b-39: gnod pa yang med do zhes bya ba ni rdo
T02D2693:300b-40: rje phung po'i rang bzhin gyi sku la smos ci
T02D2693:300b-41: dgos te / gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs pa yang mi tshugs so //
T02D2693:301a-1: chen po dgangs [*dgongs?] ni 'jig rten lha dang bcas
T02D2693:301a-2: pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni sangs rgyas
T02D2693:301a-3: rnams la gnod pa skyel bar 'dod pas kyang gnod
T02D2693:301a-4: pa skyel ba'i skabs ma rnyed cing /
T02D2693:301a-5: gnod pa rnams kyang mi snang ba'o //
T02D2693:301a-6: gal te gzhan gyi sems ma dad pa skyes par gyur na /
T02D2693:301a-7: 'jig rten 'di la sdug bsngal drag pos thebs shing
T02D2693:301a-8: shi nas kyang mda' 'phangs pa bzhin du dmyal bar
T02D2693:301a-9: 'gro'o // dmyal ba nas kyang ngan song nas ngan song du mi thar te /
T02D2693:301a-10: thar pa'i dus kyang mi 'ong ngo //
T02D2693:301a-11: de bas na bde bar gshegs pa bla ma dang /
T02D2693:301a-12: nyon mongs pa la sogs pa dang /
T02D2693:301a-13: pha ma la sogs pa la yang gnod par mi bya'o //
T02D2693:301a-14: de'i phyir na gnod par byed par sems pa yang dag par ma mthong ngo zhes bya ba'o //
T02D2693:301a-15: kye rgyal po chen po dag de lta mod kyi
T02D2693:301a-16: khyed kyi 'khor rnams pa'i 'khor la gnod par byed
T02D2693:301a-17: par sems so zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2693:301a-18: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis mngon par
T02D2693:301a-19: bltas pas ma rungs pa'i gnod rnams kyis gnod par
T02D2693:301a-21: de sems ma thag tu yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhal nas smra ba dang /
T02D2693:301a-22: ting nge 'dzin gyi byin gyis brlabs pa'o //
T02D2693:301a-23: de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2693:301a-24: bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po chen po bzhi la bka' stsal ba zhes bya ba'o //
T02D2693:301a-25: bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po chen po bzhis 'di
T02D2693:301a-26: skad ces gsol to zhes bya ba ni rgyal po
T02D2693:301a-27: chen po bzhis bcom ldan 'das la zhu ba 'bul
T02D2693:301a-28: ba'o // btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gsol ba mchis te zhes bya ba ni ;
T02D2693:301a-29: rgyal po chen po bzhis sems bcom ldan 'das la
T02D2693:301a-30: gus par byas nas srung ba dang sba ba dang
T02D2693:301a-31: yongs su bskyab pa dang zhi ba dang bde legs
T02D2693:301a-32: kyi tshigs ni bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa'o //
T02D2693:301a-33: de'i slad du bcom ldan 'das la blta ba pa dang /
T02D2693:301a-36: bcom ldan 'das nyid la zhu ba'i slad du /
T02D2693:301a-37: bdag cag bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar mchis pa lags so zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2693:301a-38: gnod pa'i sems ni ci mchis te //
T02D2693:301a-39: zhes bya ba dang rgyal po chen po bzhi dang 'khor rnams kyang bsrung bar 'dod cing /
T02D2693:301b-0: rig sngags kyi @301b rgyal mo bsil ba'i tshal gyis grags pa thos pa dang /
T02D2693:301b-1: srung ba dang bde bar 'dod pas bcom ldan 'das nyid la gus par byas shing /
T02D2693:301b-3: de ci'i slad du zhen zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2693:301b-5: rig sngags kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis sems can thams cad bde bar gnas shing nad med de /
T02D2693:301b-6: ma rungs pa'i gdon thams cad bcom zhing yang dag pa'i byang chub kyi lam la 'jug pa'o //
T02D2693:301b-7: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das dgon pa dang bas mtha'i
T02D2693:301b-8: gnas mal 'di dag na zhes bya ba ni 'jigs
T02D2693:301b-9: su rung ba dur khrod bsil ba'i tshal na ro
T02D2693:301b-10: langs dang ro dang ce spyang la sogs pa dang
T02D2693:301b-11: / bya'i tshogs mang po 'dus pa'i sa /
T02D2693:301b-12: khyi dang ces spyang 'thab pa'i sgras 'jigs su rung ste /
T02D2693:301b-13: de bzhin du ro langs dang yi dags kyang skad 'don zhing 'jigs su rung ste /
T02D2693:301b-14: de bas na bas mtha'i gnas mal zhes btags pa'o ;
T02D2693:301b-15: / shin tu sdang ba'i gnod sbyin dang //
T02D2693:301b-16: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
T02D2693:301b-17: sa gzhi nger gnas pa'i gdon rnams ni shin tu mi srun zhing ro la dga' ste /
T02D2693:301b-18: gson pa'i sha khrag la dga' zhing sems can rnams la 'tshe bar byed de /
T02D2693:301b-19: gzugs sna tshogs ston cing gzi brjid 'phrog pa dang /
T02D2693:301b-20: skad sna tshogs 'don zhing skyes pa dang bud med kyi tshogs la 'jigs par byed pa dang /
T02D2693:301b-21: gdon rigs mi gcig pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa
T02D2693:301b-22: gnas shing 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can la
T02D2693:301b-23: gnod pa'o // rims dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
T02D2693:301b-24: nad bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi de rims de dag la 'dus te /
T02D2693:301b-25: nad de rnams kyang ma rungs pa'i 'byung po rnams
T02D2693:301b-26: kyis btang zhing sems can rnams la gnod pa skyel
T02D2693:301b-27: ba'o // mi dang mi ma lags pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
T02D2693:301b-28: sa gzhi der mi rgod la sogs pa 'gyur ba ste /
T02D2693:301b-29: gzhan yang rgyal po la sogs pa'i 'jigs pa dang
T02D2693:301b-30: mi dang mi ma yin pa ma rungs pa'i 'byung
T02D2693:301b-31: po rnams kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' dang
T02D2693:301b-32: / rig sngags kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis ma nus
T02D2693:301b-33: pa'o zhes bya ba'o btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi
T02D2693:301b-34: nyan thos de dag kyang de la gnas lags te
T02D2693:302a-1: 'das kyi 'khor bzhi po yang rig sngags kyi rgyal
T02D2693:302a-2: mo bsil ba'i tshal la sbyor zhing da la gnas
T02D2693:302a-3: pa'o // btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos de dag ni /
T02D2693:302a-4: srod dang tho rangs la mi nyal bar sbyor ba
T02D2693:302a-5: la brtson par gnas so zhes bya ba ni da
T02D2693:302a-6: lta bar chod kyi rkyen zlog pa dang /
T02D2693:302a-7: tshe phyi ma'i don la byang chub kyi lam bsgoms pa dang /
T02D2693:302a-8: de ltar mi rtag pa'i rang bzhin bsgom ste /
T02D2693:302a-9: nyan thos de rnams kyang rig sngags yid la byed pa'o //
T02D2693:302a-10: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gnod sbyin dang srin po
T02D2693:302a-11: nas gnod par bgyid pa'i bar gang dag bcom ldan
T02D2693:302a-12: 'das kyi bstan pa 'di la dad pa'i sems dang
T02D2693:302a-13: ldan zhing cung zad cig mchis par bas so zhes
T02D2693:302a-14: bya ba ni / gzhan yang sdig pa'i sems dang ldan pa rnams ni /
T02D2693:302a-15: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal mthong ma thag tu dge
T02D2693:302a-16: ba'i sems la brtson zhing sems can gzhan rnams la
T02D2693:302a-17: yang sdang ba dang sdig pa'i sems dang mi ldan
T02D2693:302a-18: zhing byams pa dang snying rje la brtson zhing chos
T02D2693:302a-20: sems can rnams la 'tshe bar mi byed pa'o //
T02D2693:302a-21: de'i yon tan gyis ni cung zad cig mchis bas so zhes bya ba'o //
T02D2693:302a-22: gang dag bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa 'di la ma dad pa'i sems dang ldan pa ni /
T02D2693:302a-23: ches mang lags te zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2693:302a-24: gang dang gang dag sems can rnams ni dge ba
T02D2693:302a-25: la mi brtson zhing sdig la brtson par 'gyur ro
T02D2693:302a-26: // sdig pa'i sems dang sdang ba'i sems dang gcig
T02D2693:302a-27: gis gcig la 'tshe bar byed pa'i sems dang ldan
T02D2693:302a-28: // ba'o ; / byams pa dang snying rje'i sems dang ldan zhing chos la rtsom pa nyung ste /
T02D2693:302a-30: ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis nyon mongs pa 'phral du skye ste /
T02D2693:302a-31: phal cher sems can de rnams ni mtho ris su
T02D2693:302a-32: 'gro ba nyung zhing ngan song gsum du skye ba'o
T02D2693:302a-33: // de bas na 'byung po yi dags kyi lus
T02D2693:302a-34: thob nas kyang gzhan la gnod par byed pa'i sems
T02D2693:302a-36: de dag ni zhes bya ba ni ma rungs pa'i gdon dang 'byung po rnams glags btsal zhing /
T02D2693:302a-37: dge ba dang bsgom pa la sogs pa la bar
T02D2693:302b-0: chod byas nas mtho ris thob tu mi ster @302b
T02D2693:302b-1: ba'o ; / bcun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan
T02D2693:302b-2: thos srod dang tho rangs la mi nyal zhing sbyor
T02D2693:302b-3: ba la brtson par gnas pa rnams la gnod par
T02D2693:302b-4: byed par sems lags te zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2693:302b-5: phung po la gnod par byas nas rlung dang mkhris pa dang /
T02D2693:302b-6: bad kan dang 'dus pa'i nad btang zhing dge ba'i
T02D2693:302b-7: sbyor ba de yang mi nus par byed pa'i sems
T02D2693:302b-8: dang ldan pa mang po 'dus pa'o //
T02D2693:302b-9: sems la gnod par byed cing mi dga' bar byed pa ste /
T02D2693:302b-10: bsgom snying mi 'dod cing log par byed pa'i sems dang ldan pa mang po yod pa'o //
T02D2693:302b-11: bsgom pa'i dus su srog la zhugs shing 'chi bar
T02D2693:302b-12: byed pa'i sems dang ldan pa mang po sha stag
T02D2693:302b-13: yod pa'o // bsgom pa'i dus su ltas ngan pa
T02D2693:302b-14: dang rmi lam ngan pa bstan zhing phal cher dngos
T02D2693:302b-15: por 'byung zhing sgom du mi ster ba ste /
T02D2693:302b-16: bsgom pa'i gang zag la 'jigs par byas shing /
T02D2693:302b-17: nam sgom pa'i dus su bar chod byed cing sgom du ster ba'o //
T02D2693:302b-18: de bas na gdon de dag gis gnod par bgyid pa lags te zhes bya'o //
T02D2693:302b-19: rig sngags kyi rgyal mo bsil ba'i tshal gyi bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor bzhi po la /
T02D2693:302b-20: gdon gyis glags btsal ba'i gnas skabs te bzhi pa'o /
T02D2693:302b-22: // / de dag dgag pa'i slad du zhes bya ba
T02D2693:302b-23: ni gdon ma rungs pa rnams dang sdig can bdud
T02D2693:302b-24: kyi rigs dang sa dang bar snang dang sa 'og
T02D2693:302b-25: la rgyu ba'i 'byung po rnams stong phrag brgyad cu
T02D2693:302b-26: ste / de phrag nyi shu rtsa drug go //
T02D2693:302b-27: de bzhin du g-yog dang chung ma dang bu dang bu mo la yang yin no //
T02D2693:302b-28: gnod sbyin ma rungs pa rnams dad par bgyi ba dang zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2693:302b-29: de bzhin du ma rungs pa'i gdon rnams mi dad
T02D2693:302b-30: de sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun gyi byin
T02D2693:302b-31: gyi rlabs kyis dad par byed pa'o //
T02D2693:302b-32: dad pa rnams slar zhing dad par bgyi ba dang
T02D2693:302b-33: zhes bya ba ni phyi bzhin nas yod pa'i sems
T02D2693:302b-34: ni yang dang yang du dad pa skyes pa ste
T02D2693:302b-35: / de 'ong bar mi byed pa'i sems ni brtan par mi byed pa'o ;
T02D2693:302b-36: /'khor bzhi po rnams bde legs dang zhes bya ba
T02D2693:302b-37: ni sngar gnod par byed 'dod pa'i sems dang sdang
T02D2693:302b-38: bar 'dod pa'i gdon de rnams ni dad pa'i sems
T02D2693:302b-40: 'khor bzhi po de dag dang sems can thams cad bde bar gnas par 'gyur ro //
T02D2693:303a-1: par bgyi ba dang zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2693:303a-2: bsgom pa dang nyan pa la yang bar chod med cing de bzhin du spyod pa dang /
T02D2693:303a-3: dge ba'i rtsa ba bsngo ba la bar chod med
T02D2693:303a-4: cing de rnams la bde bar bgyi bas na bde
T02D2693:303a-5: ba'o // ma lus par shin tu mnyam par bzhag par 'gyur ba'i slad du zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2693:303a-6: rnam par rtog pa ma lus par 'joms te /
T02D2693:303a-7: de 'joms na bar du gcod pa'i bgegs kyang smos ci dgos te /
T02D2693:303a-8: shes bya dang bag chags kyi dri mas mi gos pa'o //
T02D2693:303a-9: bsil ba'i tshal gyi mdo chen po 'di bshad par 'tshal lo zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2693:303a-10: 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar yod
T02D2693:303a-11: pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs pa thabs shes rab
T02D2693:303a-13: de'i chos kyi nyams myong gis zla ba sems can
T02D2693:303a-14: rnams la bsil bar byed pa bzhin du des kyang
T02D2693:303a-15: sems can rnams la bde bar byas pa'o //
T02D2693:303a-16: rig sngags des kyang 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad la nam mkhas khyab pa bzhin du khyab pa'o //
T02D2693:303a-17: mi ma yin pa sdang sems can //
T02D2693:303a-18: rgyal ba'i bstan la ma dad pa //
T02D2693:303a-20: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sh'akya thub pas
T02D2693:303a-21: sems can rnams la phan par bgyid pas mi ma
T02D2693:303a-23: lha'i gdon la sogs pa rig sngags kyi rgyal mo
T02D2693:303a-24: bsil ba'i tshal gyi byin gyi rlabs kyis sdig pa'i
T02D2693:303a-25: sems dang ldan pa yang sdig pa'i sems med cing
T02D2693:303a-26: srog gcod pa'i sems dang ldan pa rnams kyang srog
T02D2693:303a-27: mi gcod cing / bstan pa yang srung bar byed pa'o //
T02D2693:303a-28: de dag bdag gis bzlog par bya //
T02D2693:303a-29: rgyal chen rnams ni bdag la nyon //
T02D2693:303a-31: bcom ldan 'das kyi bkas rig sngags kyi rgyal mo'i gzi brjid kyis ma dad par byas pa ste /
T02D2693:303a-32: dad pa rnams kyang spang bar mi byed pa'o //
T02D2693:303a-33: rgyal chen bzhi 'khor dang bcas pa rnams kyis kyang sems la zung shig ces bya'o ;
T02D2693:303a-34: / mdo chen 'di ni thos nas kyang //
T02D2693:303a-35: mi rnams la ni gnod ma byed //
T02D2693:303a-37: sdig pa thams cad rlag par byed pas na mdo ste /
T02D2693:303a-38: dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dod pas na mdo'o //
T02D2693:303a-39: yang na sangs rgyas rnams kyi yon tan dang chos kyi nges tshig dang /
T02D2693:303b-0: dge ba dang mi @303b dge ba thams cad de
T02D2693:303b-1: nas 'byung zhing bshad de gsal bar bshad pas mdo
T02D2693:303b-2: zhes bya'o // chen po ni sangs rgyas kyi bka' dang /
T02D2693:303b-3: ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa ste /
T02D2693:303b-4: de lta bu'i ye shes kyi don thob pas na thob pa ste /
T02D2693:303b-5: da lta bu'i rang bzhin gyi don gyis 'jigs pa med cing gnod pa yang mi mnga' ste /
T02D2693:303b-6: sems can rnams la phan par byed pa'o //
T02D2693:303b-7: gnod sbyin srin po klu rnams dang //
T02D2693:303b-8: nam mkha' lding dang gsang ba pa //
T02D2693:303b-10: ma rungs pa thams cad de rnams kyis byed de /
T02D2693:303b-11: sdig pa yang de rnams kyis byed pa /
T02D2693:303b-12: sems can la gnod par byed cing za ba dang 'thung ba tshol ba'o //
T02D2693:303b-13: phan par mi 'dod gang yang rung //
T02D2693:303b-14: de dag thams cad bzlog par bya //
T02D2693:303b-16: sangs rgyas kyi bka' dang rig sngags kyi dmod mos /
T02D2693:303b-17: ma rungs pa thams cad rlag par byed cing thal bar btang ste /
T02D2693:303b-18: ma dad pa rnams kyang snang bar mi byed do //
T02D2693:303b-19: lha dang lha min rlung lha dang //
T02D2693:303b-20: ma mo'i tshogs kyis gang ba yi //
T02D2693:303b-22: gzugs kyi khams kyi lha dang //
T02D2693:303b-23: 'dod pa'i khams kyi lha rnams dang //
T02D2693:303b-24: phyogs skyong ba la sogs pa dang /
T02D2693:303b-25: dam tshig la gnas pa'i lha mo rnams yin te /
T02D2693:303b-26: de yang ye shes pa dang /
T02D2693:303b-27: 'jig rten gyi lha mo rnams so //
T02D2693:303b-28: gzhal med khang mdzes de dag ni //
T02D2693:303b-31: 'jig rten pa ni 'jig rten gyi khams gzhal yas khang la gnas te /
T02D2693:303b-32: ye shes pa yang de bzhin yin te /
T02D2693:303b-33: so so rang rang gi 'od zer gyi snang bas nam mkha' la mdzes par snang ba'o //
T02D2693:303b-34: nyi ma zla ba'i tshul 'dra bar //
T02D2693:303b-35: rin chen las byas shin tu snang //
T02D2693:303b-37: mun pa mun nag gi nang na /
T02D2693:303b-38: yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po ches mi snang ste /
T02D2693:303b-39: de bzhin du nyi ma zla bas gsal bar byas shing rin po che mthong ngo //
T02D2693:303b-40: de bzhin du glo bur gyi skyon nyon mongs pa rnams kyis bkag cing /
T02D2693:303b-41: bla ma dam pa rnams kyi gdams ngag bstan pas ye shes de snang ba'o //
T02D2693:303b-42: ba sod [*bsod] nams byas pa dag gis gang //
T02D2693:303b-43: rab sdang gdon rnams rnam par spangs //
T02D2693:304a-0: @304a * // de bzhin de'i dge ba byas pa'i bsod nams bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o //
T02D2693:304a-2: sdig ba bsags pa thams cad des de'i 'joms par byed pa'o //
T02D2693:304a-3: mi la gnod byed gang yin pa'i //
T02D2693:304a-4: 'byung po grul bum srin po dang //
T02D2693:304a-5: zhes bya ba ni khams gsum tsam yang skad cig gis khyab ste //
T02D2693:304a-6: la la bza' rgyu yong cing mchod par 'os te /
T02D2693:304a-7: la la sems can rnams kyis kyang sdang zhing dmod mos pa'o //
T02D2693:304a-8: de 'byung po rnams kyis kyang mi'i sems can la gnod par byed pa'o //
T02D2693:304a-9: yi dags srul po de dag gis //
T02D2693:304a-10: rmad byung de dag mi mthong ste //
T02D2693:304a-12: rig sngags kyi rgyal mo bsil ba'i tshal gyi ye
T02D2693:304a-13: shes sdig can de dag gis mi mthong zhing de
T02D2693:304a-14: dag rnams kyang bde bar gnas par mi 'gyur ro
T02D2693:304a-15: // gzi brjid ldan pa'i lha rnams kyis //
T02D2693:304a-18: 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lha rnams te /
T02D2693:304a-19: sems can la gnod par mi byed cing /
T02D2693:304a-20: byams pa dang snying rjes 'tsho ba'o //
T02D2693:304a-21: de rnams kyi gzi brjid kyis ma rungs pa'i gdon rnams kyang rtsar 'gro bar mi nus shing //
T02D2693:304a-22: gnas kyang thob par mi 'gyur ro //
T02D2693:304a-24: / der yang de dag 'dur mi dbang //
T02D2693:304a-26: sems can la gnod par byed pa 'byung po de kun yang /
T02D2693:304a-27: lcang lo can gyi pho brang ci smos te /
T02D2693:304a-28: de'i ra ba'i phyi rol yang mi thob cing /
T02D2693:304a-29: rig sngags kyi dmod mos bde bar mi gnas pa'o //
T02D2693:304a-30: stan nam yang na chu yang rung //
T02D2693:304a-31: zas dang skom yang mi dbang ngo //
T02D2693:304a-33: de bzhin de la dam las 'das pa rnams 'thung ba dang za ba ci smos te /
T02D2693:304a-34: 'thung ba'i skom yang zangs gyi chur mthong ngo //
T02D2693:304a-35: bza' ba'i zas kyang lcags kyi thu lum 'bar bar mthong /
T02D2693:304a-36: lus ngan gyi ni po brang du //
T02D2693:304a-39: gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon lcang lo can gyi pho
T02D2693:304a-40: brang du sdig can 'byung po gnod byed rnams dang
T02D2693:304a-41: / gzhan yang gnod sbyin rnams kyis srung zhing pho
T02D2693:304a-42: brang nang du stan yang thob par mi 'gyur ro
T02D2693:304b-0: / // rgyal po chen po rnams kyi tshig /'byung @304b po gang zhig mi nyan pa //
T02D2693:304b-2: rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag gis smras pa ste /
T02D2693:304b-3: rgyal po chen po bzhi po ni /
T02D2693:304b-7: lus ngan po rnams yin te /
T02D2693:304b-8: de'i rig sngags kyi dmod mo dang rgyal po bzhi'i chad pas /
T02D2693:304b-9: 'byung po de rnams bde bar mi 'gyur ro //
T02D2693:304b-10: de yi kha nas khrag dron dag / myur du rab tu 'bab par 'gyur //
T02D2693:304b-12: ma rungs pa'i 'byung po de rnams rgyal po chen
T02D2693:304b-13: po bzhi'i chad pas myur du nad kyis thebs te

T02D2693:304b-15: mda' 'phangs pa bzhin du myur du dmyal bar skyes so //
T02D2693:304b-16: de yi brla yi g-yas rol nas //
T02D2693:304b-19: 'byung po de rnams kyi brla g-yas rol nas ma rungs pa'i nad 'byung ste /
T02D2693:304b-21: rig sngags kyi bka' las 'das pa dang ;
T02D2693:304b-22: sems can la gnod par byas pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2693:304b-24: gdon sbyin gzugs kyang ston par 'gyur //
T02D2693:304b-26: nad de rnams kyis btab na 'chi ste /
T02D2693:304b-27: tshe phyi ma la ngan song gsum du skye zhing /
T02D2693:304b-28: 'byung po'i lus blangs par gyur kyang gzhan rnams kyis bsnyen du mi btub cing //
T02D2693:304b-29: de bas kyang sdug bsngal thob par 'gyur ro //
T02D2693:304b-30: 'jig rten skyong gis bshad pa yi //
T02D2693:304b-31: mdo las gang zhig 'gal byed pa //
T02D2693:304b-33: 'jig rten skyong ba bcu po ste /
T02D2693:304b-46: de rnams kyis kyang chad par gsungs so //
T02D2693:304b-47: yang na 'jig rten las 'das pa'i 'jig rten skyong ba ni thabs la mkhas pa /
T02D2693:304b-48: sems can la snying rje che ba /
T02D2693:304b-49: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams so //
T02D2693:304b-50: de rnams kyis kyang bden pa'i bka' gsungs pa'o //
T02D2693:304b-52: mgo bo tshal pa bdun du 'gas //
T02D2693:305a-1: 'byung po la sogs pa'i 'jigs pa dang /
T02D2693:305a-2: za ba dang skom med cing rig sngags kyang dmod
T02D2693:305a-3: mos 'chi ba'i dus sum go tshal par 'gas nas
T02D2693:305a-4: 'chi'o // rgyal po chen po rnams kyi tshig / gnod sbyin gang dag ma nyan pa //
T02D2693:305a-6: rgyal po chen po rnams thos kyi bu la sogs pas gsungs te /
T02D2693:305a-7: rig sngags kyi bka' las 'da' ba dang /
T02D2693:305a-8: rgyal po chen po bzhi'i bka' ma nyan par gyur na /
T02D2693:305a-9: de rnams kyis sdug bsngal chen po thob pa'o //
T02D2693:305a-10: 'byung po srin po gang yod pa //
T02D2693:305a-11: ngan phreng lhag pa'i ngan phreng rnams //
T02D2693:305a-13: 'byung po de rnams ni gcig la gcig gi phrag dog gis ngan sems skye ste /
T02D2693:305a-14: de'i ngan pa yang nas yang du ngan pa'o //
T02D2693:305a-15: lcags las byas pa'i 'khor lo yi //
T02D2693:305a-16: mtshon cha spu gri so 'dra bas //
T02D2693:305a-18: de yis de ngan pa rnams ni rig sngags kyi bka' las 'das te /
T02D2693:305a-19: mtshon cha lta bu'i las kyi spu gris yang nas
T02D2693:305a-20: yang du gcod cing sdug bsngal chen po thob pa'o
T02D2693:305a-21: // gnod sbyin de dag brlag par 'gyur //
T02D2693:305a-22: rgyal po chen po dpal dang ldan //
T02D2693:305a-24: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bka' las 'das pa dang /
T02D2693:305a-25: rig sngags kyi bka'i dmod mos rlag par byed pa ste /
T02D2693:305a-26: de bzhin du rgyal po chen po bzhi po rnams kyis kyang /
T02D2693:305a-27: dpal dang ldan pa ni gzi brjid che zhing stobs che ba ste /
T02D2693:305a-28: rdzu 'phrul dang ldan zhing sems can gyi don byed pa'o //
T02D2693:305a-29: go cha sra zhing mtshon rno la /
T02D2693:305a-30: stan rnams la ni 'khod pa dag / ces bya ba ni /
T02D2693:305a-32: rig sngags kyi bka' las 'das pa la ni /
T02D2693:305a-33: de dag dang 'khod par byas nas //
T02D2693:305a-34: mtshon cha sna tshogs thogs nas phyogs phyogs su bsdad pa'o //
T02D2693:305a-35: shar phyogs na ni yul 'khor srung //
T02D2693:305a-36: lho phyogs na ni 'phags skyes po //
T02D2693:305a-38: dri za'i rgyal po stong phrag nyi shu rtsa brgyad 'khor g-yog dang bcas pa ste /
T02D2693:305a-39: de bzhin du grul bum gyi rgyal po 'khor g-yog dang bcas pa'o //
T02D2693:305a-40: nub phyogs na ni mig mi bzang //
T02D2693:305a-41: byang phyogs na ni lus ngan po //
T02D2693:305b-0: klu'i rgyal po stong phrag nyi shu rtsa brgyad @305b 'khor g-yog dang bcas pa ste /
T02D2693:305b-1: de bzhin du gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po rnams kyang yin no //
T02D2693:305b-2: go cha gon zhing mtshon sna tshogs pa stobs dang ldan pa sha stag go //
T02D2693:305b-3: de dag de na 'khod pa yi //
T02D2693:305b-4: nyen skor gnod sbyin 'di rnams gnas //
T02D2693:305b-5: zhes bya ba ni phyogs bzhi nas bu dang 'khor
T02D2693:305b-6: g-yog dang chung ma la sogs pa rnams kyis kyang
T02D2693:305b-7: phyogs phyogs nas srung zhing gnas pa'o //
T02D2693:305b-8: seng ge'i gzugs dang stag gi gzugs //
T02D2693:305b-9: mi sdug pa dang 'gro zhing rgyu //
T02D2693:305b-11: 'byung po de rnams kyang 'dul bar byed pa'i rgyal
T02D2693:305b-12: po rnams ni seng ge dang stag gi mgo can
T02D2693:305b-13: du gnas pa'o ; / skad cig mas stong rgyu zhing 'khor bar gnas pa'o //
T02D2693:305b-14: glang chen gzugs dang rta yi gzugs //
T02D2693:305b-15: kha cig ma he'i gzugs can te //
T02D2693:305b-16: zhes bya ba ni stobs dang ldan zhing gzi brjid che ste /
T02D2693:305b-17: skad cig mas ri rab rtse mo dang bar snang
T02D2693:305b-18: dang sa steng dang sa 'og tu dus gcig tu
T02D2693:305b-19: rgyu'o// dred mo dang ni ba yi gzugs //
T02D2693:305b-20: lug dang spyang ki phag rgod rnams //
T02D2693:305b-22: 'byung po de rnams kyang sna tshogs kyi gzugs su sprul zhing sems can rnams la bstan pa'o //
T02D2693:305b-23: rna ba 'phyang dang rna bo che //
T02D2693:305b-24: rna ba gcig pa tha dad pa //
T02D2693:305b-26: glang po che bzhin du rna ba 'phyang ba ste /
T02D2693:305b-27: rna ba gcig pus gos byas shing //
T02D2693:305b-28: lus bo thams cad khebs pa ste //
T02D2693:305b-29: de bzhin du gzugs bstan zhing sems can rnams la gnod par byed pa'o //
T02D2693:305b-31: sa gzhi rab tu g-yo bar byed //
T02D2693:305b-33: bum pa'i nang du skad smras pa bzhin du sems
T02D2693:305b-34: can rnams la 'tshe bar byas shing 'jigs par byed
T02D2693:305b-35: de / bar chod byed pa dang /
T02D2693:305b-36: gnod par byed pa'i dus su sa g-yo zhing skad sna tshogs 'don par byed pa'o //
T02D2693:305b-37: bong bu dang ni rnga mo che //
T02D2693:305b-40: mi'i lus la rnga mo bong bu'i mgo bo dang /
T02D2693:305b-41: gzhan yang sems can gyi gzugs su sprul nas /
T02D2693:305b-42: gzugs dngos su bstan pa dang /
T02D2693:305b-44: rgyal po chen po stobs po che //
T02D2693:305b-45: de dag phan tshun 'du ba ni //
T02D2693:305b-47: de bzhin du stobs dang ldan pas 'byung po ma rungs pa rnams kyang /
T02D2693:306a-0: @306a * // rgyal po chen po rnams kyis 'dul zhing sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa bsrung ba'o //
T02D2693:306a-1: lha yi shing rta bcas pa yis //
T02D2693:306a-2: nam mkha' las ni 'gro bar byed //
T02D2693:306a-4: sna tshogs pa'i mtshon cha thogs shing dpung dang bcas shing 'gro ba ste /
T02D2693:306a-5: de bzhin du bar snang dang sa 'og dangs stengs la rgyu ba'o //
T02D2693:306a-6: gnod sbyin dag gi bdag po yang //
T02D2693:306a-7: mi rnams la ni bde legs byed //
T02D2693:306a-9: sangs rgyas kyi bden pa dang /
T02D2693:306a-10: rig sngags kyi bka' las mi 'da' zhing /
T02D2693:306a-11: gnod sbyin 'khor g-yog stong phrag nyi shu rtsa brgyad kyi bdag po ste /
T02D2693:306a-12: rnam thos kyi bu de yang sems can la gnod par mi byed cing /
T02D2693:306a-14: de bzhin du rig sngags la mchod par byed cing /
T02D2693:306a-16: rig sngags kyi ngo bo ni gang zhe na /
T02D2693:306a-18: las kyi rigs ma yin te /
T02D2693:306a-19: mtshon pa ni bya ba nan tan gyi ye shes //
T02D2693:306a-20: mtshon byed ni rig sngags kyi rgyal mo'o //
T02D2693:306a-21: ye shes lnga'i bdag nyid can /
T02D2693:306a-22: sangs rgyas lnga'i dbu rgyan can /
T02D2693:306a-23: spyan gsum zhal gsum phyag drug pa sku mdog ljang gu'o //
T02D2693:306a-24: zhal g-yas mthing ga / g-yon dmar ba ste /
T02D2693:306a-25: phyag g-yas pa gnyis na ral gri dang rdo rje rgya gram mo //
T02D2693:306a-27: skyabs sbyin dang 'khor lo bsnams pa'o //
T02D2693:306a-28: phyag 'og ma'i g-yas g-yon gyis mda' gzhu 'gengs pa ste /
T02D2693:306a-29: rgyan thams cad dang ldan pa'o //
T02D2693:306a-32: padma dang zla ba'i gdan la bzhugs shing /
T02D2693:306a-33: nyi ma'i 'od dang ldan zhing bzhad pa'i tshul du bzhugs pa'o //
T02D2693:306a-34: rig sngags kyi gsang sngags ni gang zhe na /
T02D2693:306a-36: bha ga hu mu le bha ga hu mu le /
T02D2693:306a-37: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T02D2693:306a-38: rgyal po chen po rnam thos bu //
T02D2693:306a-39: mi la zhon pa sde bcas pa ;
T02D2693:306a-41: rig sngags kyi rgyal mo bsil ba'i tshal gyi tshigs
T02D2693:306a-42: su bcad pa 'di thos pa tsam gyis lus 'dar
T02D2693:306a-44: gnod sbyin gyi gdon stong phrag nyi shu rtsa brgyad kyang de bzhin no //
T02D2693:306a-45: 'di smras nas ni tshub ma langs //
T02D2693:306b-0: de bzhin ri yang @306b g-yos par 'gyur //
T02D2693:306b-2: rig sngags kyi rgyal mo bsil ba'i tshal 'di'i gzi
T02D2693:306b-3: brjid dang stobs kyis rlung tshub sna tshogs 'byung ste
T02D2693:306b-4: / sa ni lan drug tu g-yos shing /
T02D2693:306b-5: dril bu'i skad bzhin du rings par snang ngo //
T02D2693:306b-6: rgyal po chen po rnam thos bu'i //
T02D2693:306b-7: rin chen shing rta bcas pa na //
T02D2693:306b-9: byang ngos kyi rgyal po rnam thos kyi bu de yang gzugs sna tshogs bstan zhing /
T02D2693:306b-10: rin po che'i gdan la bzhugs nas /
T02D2693:306b-12: lha dang mi yi sgra skad bsgrags //
T02D2693:306b-13: rgyal po chen po mchis pa na //
T02D2693:306b-15: lha dang mi'i gzugs su sprul zhing rdzu 'phrul chen po bstan te /
T02D2693:306b-16: skad sna tshogs kyang de bzhin du smras pa'o //
T02D2693:306b-18: srin po 'dod dgur bsgyur ba'i gzugs //
T02D2693:306b-20: rig sngags kyi rgyal mo'i gsang sngags kyi dmod mo dang /
T02D2693:306b-21: gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po rnam thos kyi bu'i stobs kyis kyang /
T02D2693:306b-22: ma rungs pa'i srin po 'byung po rnams kyang dngos po rnams ni skrag par 'gyur ro //
T02D2693:306b-23: de yi mdun na rgyug par bgyid //
T02D2693:306b-24: mi ma yin pa'i gzugs rnams kyis //
T02D2693:306b-26: gzi brjid de mthong zhing 'jigs par byed cing phyir 'gro ba'o //
T02D2693:306b-27: 'jigs shing skrag pa skyed par bgyid //
T02D2693:306b-28: che zhing gtum la mi bzad pa //
T02D2693:306b-30: 'byung po de rnams kyi mtshan nyid ni /
T02D2693:306b-31: sems can la 'tshe bar byed cing /
T02D2693:306b-32: rmi lam nyams pa la yang gzugs bstan zhing /
T02D2693:306b-33: 'jigs pa'i sgra sgrogs te rtag tu sems can la gnod par byed pa'o //
T02D2693:306b-34: drag cid [*cing] mthong na mi sdug la //
T02D2693:306b-35: spu yang ring la sen mo ring //
T02D2693:306b-37: bzhin mi sdug cing lus dang gdong pa khra bor gnas te /
T02D2693:306b-38: khab dang 'dra ba'i spus ni lus la khengs shing
T02D2693:306b-39: de bzhin du sder mo yang mtshon dang 'dra ba'o
T02D2693:306b-40: // lag na ral gri tho ba thogs //
T02D2693:306b-41: so ni zangs can 'jigs par bgyid //
T02D2693:306b-43: 'byung po de rnams ni khrag khrug la dga' zhing /
T02D2693:306b-44: phra ma byed pa la dga' ba ste /
T02D2693:306b-45: de bzhin du khrag khrug byed pa'i sha khrag la
T02D2693:306b-46: dga' zhing 'jigs pa'i ral gri dang 'jigs pa'i zangs
T02D2693:307a-1: kyis sems can la 'tshe bar byed pa'o //
T02D2693:307a-2: sna che rnga mo stag gi 'dra //
T02D2693:307a-3: drag cing lag pa khrag dmar ba //
T02D2693:307a-5: 'byung po 'di rnams kyis kyang sna tshogs kyi gzugs bstan zhing /
T02D2693:307a-6: mi'i lus la mgo gcig pa bstan zhing bud med
T02D2693:307a-7: kyi mngal khrag la dga' zhing byis pa rnams la
T02D2693:307a-9: yan lag ma tshad phyed tshal lus //
T02D2693:307a-10: mig ser lus kyang shin tu ser //
T02D2693:307a-12: la la mgo bo med cing brang la gdong pa yod pa ste /
T02D2693:307a-13: la la lag pa gcig med cing /
T02D2693:307a-15: tshan gcig la yang rkang pa gcig med cing //
T02D2693:307a-16: lte ba nas res snad res mi snang bar byed de /
T02D2693:307a-17: la la phyed gzugs su snang zhing sems can rnams skrag par byed pa'o //
T02D2693:307a-18: dri ma can la lus skem pa //
T02D2693:307a-19: skra brdzes lcags kyi mchu can la //
T02D2693:307a-20: zhes bya ba ni keng rus la pags pas g-yogs pa dang 'dra ba yod de /
T02D2693:307a-21: de la drag pa chags shing bzhin mi sdug pa ste /
T02D2693:307a-22: khab kyi rtse mo tsam gyi mchu la gsus pa yang ri tsam mo //
T02D2693:307a-23: de lta bu'i lus la skra bzang brdzes pa'o //
T02D2693:307a-24: mtshon cha tshabs cher 'debs par bgyid //
T02D2693:307a-25: rna ba gzhu 'dra stobs po che //
T02D2693:307a-29: 'khrug pa dbung dang bcas pa byas te /
T02D2693:307a-30: de la mtshon cha tshabs cher 'bebs pa zhes bya ba'o //
T02D2693:307a-31: rna ba gzhu 'dra ba yod cing bzhin mi sdug pa yin te /
T02D2693:307a-32: de lta bu'i 'byung po rnams kyis kyang sems can rnams la drag por gnod pa'o //
T02D2693:307a-33: sbrul gyi gzugs can be'u'i gzugs //
T02D2693:307a-34: phag gi gzugs can lto po che //
T02D2693:307a-36: mi'i lus la mgo brnyan mi gcig pa ste /
T02D2693:307a-37: rtag tu ltas dang rmi lam la yang de'i gzugs bstan la /
T02D2693:307a-38: rnam par rtog pa skye par byed pa'o //
T02D2693:307a-39: de skyes pa dang nad drag pos mi tshugs te /
T02D2693:307a-40: nad kyis srog dang bral bar byed pa'o //
T02D2693:307a-41: mgo bo che la lag ring ba //
T02D2693:307a-44: tshan gcig 'dre mo'i gzugs yod de /
T02D2693:307a-45: dpag tshad brgya'i bar nas kyang 'tshe bar byas shing sha khrag len nus te /
T02D2693:307b-0: bzhin mi sdug cing @307b lag pa ring ba'i sbar mos 'debs pa'o //
T02D2693:307b-1: de 'dra'i gnod sbyin mang po yi //
T02D2693:307b-2: g-yog 'khor dag gis yongs su bskor /
T02D2693:307b-4: de dag ni rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu'i 'khor yin te /
T02D2693:307b-5: stobs che zhing mi srun te /
T02D2693:307b-6: khams gsum tsam la 'gyur zhing dur khrod bsil ba'i tshal na gnas pa'o //
T02D2693:307b-7: gnod sbyin bye ba phrag stong rnams //
T02D2693:307b-8: de dag ma ni lam log can //
T02D2693:307b-10: de dag ni byang phyogs na gnas pa ste /
T02D2693:307b-12: tshan gcig phan bya dang gnod bya gnyis byed par 'ongs pa ste /
T02D2693:307b-13: tshan gcig snying rje med cing sems can la 'tshe ba /
T02D2693:307b-14: tshan gcig snying rje dang ldan zhing sems can la grogs byed pa'o //
T02D2693:307b-15: g-yog 'khor de dag lhan cig tu //
T02D2693:307b-16: bdag ni phyag 'tshal slad du mchis //
T02D2693:307b-18: de dag lta bu'i 'byung po rnams kyis kyang /

T02D2693:308a-0: sems can rnams la 'tshe bar byed cing ma'i mngal nas zhugs nas gzi brjid @308a * //
T02D2693:308a-2: sna dang rna ba bcad pa dang //
T02D2693:308a-3: chad pa mang pos bcad pa dang //

T02D2693:308a-8: gzhan rnams kyis kyang de'i 'bras bu sna dang rna ba dang /
T02D2693:308a-10: lag pa gcod pa'i chad pa byed par 'gyur ro //
T02D2693:308a-11: de yang 'byung po rnams kyis skyon byas pa yin no //
T02D2693:308a-12: mgo ma mchis dang mgo bcad dang //
T02D2693:308a-13: lus kyang sgur la gnyer ma gdong //
T02D2693:308a-15: de rnams tshan gcig gis kyang sems can rnams la rmi lam dang /
T02D2693:308a-17: dngos por mthong bar byas te /
T02D2693:308a-18: de'i rtog pas nad sna tshogs btang zhing sems can gyi srog 'phrog pa'o //
T02D2693:308a-19: de rnams ni ltas ngan gyi 'byung po rnams yin no //
T02D2693:308a-20: mig la me 'bar rkang phyed pa //
T02D2693:308a-21: mi rnams 'jigs par bgyid pa ste //
T02D2693:308a-26: lung stong la gnas pa ste /
T02D2693:308a-27: sems can mi rnams kyis mthong bar gyur pa na ngo sbed pa ste /
T02D2693:308a-28: 'byung bo des sems can mthong na nyin mo gnod mi nus shing /
T02D2693:308a-29: mtshan mo'i rigs la cis kyang phan pa med cing srog 'phrog pa'o //
T02D2693:308a-30: 'phel ka che la rgod bag can //
T02D2693:308a-31: de bzhin 'gro zhing rgyu bar bgyid //
T02D2693:308a-33: 'phel ka cha zhing mtshan rnams rgyu ba ste /
T02D2693:308a-34: pho mo nyal ba'i dus su mnyan nas glags rnyed par gyur na lus la 'jug ste /
T02D2693:308a-35: bdud kyi rigs su skyes nas pha ma rnams skrag par byed pa'o //
T02D2693:308a-36: de 'dra'i gnod sbyin mang po yi //
T02D2693:308a-37: g-yog 'khor dag gis yongs su bskor //
T02D2693:308a-39: bcom ldan 'das ga la der 'byung po rnams kyis bskor te /
T02D2693:308a-41: 'jig rten mgon gyi spyan sngar bsdad pa'o //
T02D2693:308a-42: gnod sbyin bye ba phrag stong rnams //
T02D2693:308a-43: de dag ma ni rkun ma lags //
T02D2693:308a-45: de dag kun kyang dur khrod chen po bsil ba'i tshal na gnas shing /
T02D2693:308a-46: rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu'i 'khor yin te /
T02D2693:308b-0: de rnams @308b kyang rig sngags kyi gzi brjid gyis 'khod pa'o //
T02D2693:308b-1: g-yog 'khor de dag lhan cig tu //
T02D2693:308b-2: bdag ni phyag 'tshal slad du mchis //
T02D2693:308b-4: dpon g-yog de rnams kyis kyang /
T02D2693:308b-5: bcom ldan 'das la gus par byas nas /
T02D2693:308b-6: phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas phyag 'tshal ba'o //
T02D2693:308b-7: goo tam dpa' bo khyod la ni //
T02D2693:308b-8: chos bzhin mthun par lta zhing mchis //
T02D2693:308b-10: 'jig rten dbang phyug gi spyan sngar sems can rnams
T02D2693:308b-11: la 'tshe bar mi byed cing snying rje dang ldan
T02D2693:308b-12: te / rig sngags kyi rgyal mo bsil ba'i tshal gyi dmod mos 'tshe bar mi nus pa'o //
T02D2693:308b-13: bdag cag gi ni gnas 'di na /
T02D2693:308b-14: shing rta zhes bgyi srin po mchis //

T02D2693:308b-17: de rnams kyis kyang sems can rnams la gnod par byed cing 'bru gu'i nad rnams gtong ba'o //

T02D2693:308b-19: stong phrag bcu yi grangs snyed mchis //
T02D2693:308b-21: srin mo'i tshogs kyang de rnams 'byung ste /
T02D2693:308b-22: stobs dang ldan zhing rang gi kha dog tu snang
T02D2693:308b-23: ba de rnams kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan
T02D2693:308b-24: sngar 'khod pa'o // de dag bdag gi g-yog lags te //

T02D2693:308b-27: bdag cag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar g-yog du ma dang bcas nas mchis te /

T02D2693:308b-31: goo ta ma dpa' bo khyod la ni //
T02D2693:308b-32: chos bzhin mthun par lta zhing mchis //
T02D2693:308b-34: 'jig rten bla ma'i spyan snga ru /
T02D2693:308b-35: sems can rnams la snying rje dang ldan zhing 'tshe bar mi byed de //
T02D2693:308b-36: rig sngags kyi rgyal mo'i gzi brjid kyis sems can rnams la 'tshe bar mi byed pa'o //
T02D2693:308b-37: bdag cag gis ni gnas rnams na //
T02D2693:308b-38: mgrin rings zhes bya'i srin mo mchis //
T02D2693:308b-40: lang ka mgrin bcu'i rigs mgo bcu gcig yod pa 'jigs su rung ba rnams 'byung ba'o //
T02D2693:308b-41: srin mo shin tu gnag pa dag / srin mo nag mo zhes bgyi dang //
T02D2693:309a-2: srin mo ral pa gcig pa rnams /
T02D2693:309a-3: 'khor g-yog du ma dang bcas ba byung ste /
T02D2693:309a-4: de rnams kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga ru'o //
T02D2693:309a-5: srin mo rab gnas rnams mchis te //
T02D2693:309a-6: de dag goo ta ma mthun par lta //
T02D2693:309a-8: rgya mtsho'i 'gram na zangs gling zhes bya ba'i yul na gnas te /
T02D2693:309a-9: de bas kyang gnag pa lnga brgya yod de /
T02D2693:309a-10: de rnams kyis kyang sems can la 'tshe bar byas shing /
T02D2693:309a-11: bud med du brdzus nas gnod pa skyel ba'o //
T02D2693:309a-12: sa yi gnod sbyin bdag nyid che //
T02D2693:309a-13: de dag sa stengs gnas pa lta //
T02D2693:309a-15: nor rgyun ma'i 'khor g-yog yin te /
T02D2693:309a-16: de yang ljang ma mo dang /
T02D2693:309a-18: 'od ldan ma la sogs pa yin te /
T02D2693:309a-19: de rnams kyis kyang sems can la gnod par mi byed cing /
T02D2693:309a-21: sa la gnas shing sa la bdag byed pa'o //
T02D2693:309a-22: g-yog 'khor de dag rnams kyis ni //
T02D2693:309a-23: yongs su bskor te 'dir mchis lags //
T02D2693:309a-27: sa bdag mo la sogs pa 'khor g-yog du ma
T02D2693:309a-28: dang thabs cig tu bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar
T02D2693:309a-29: ro // de dag kun dang lhan cig tu //
T02D2693:309a-30: bdag ni phyag 'tshal slad du mchis //
T02D2693:309a-33: sangs rgyas rnams la skyabs su mchi'o //
T02D2693:309a-34: sems can la gnod par mi byed cing /
T02D2693:309a-35: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang thabs cig tu 'khod pa'o //
T02D2693:309a-36: goo ta ma dpa' bo khyod la ni //
T02D2693:309a-37: chos bzhin mthun par lta zhing mchis //
T02D2693:309a-39: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
T02D2693:309a-40: kyi dbang phyug la bdag cag sems can rnams la
T02D2693:309a-41: 'tshe bar mi byed cing spyan sngar mchis pa'o //
T02D2693:309a-42: bdag gi mdun na rgyug pa yi //
T02D2693:309a-43: yi dags gnod sbyin srin po rnams //
T02D2693:309a-45: lus ngan po'i spyan sngar rgyug pa'i ma rungs pa
T02D2693:309a-46: byed pa la dga' ba'i 'khor tshan gcig yod de
T02D2693:309a-47: / sdig la dga' zhing snying la mi sdug pa sha stag go //
T02D2693:309a-48: lus chen shugs kyang drag po ste //
T02D2693:309a-49: so yang che la lto bo che //
T02D2693:309b-0: 'jig rten g-yo bar nus shing yud tsam @309b gyis gang la yang khyab ste /
T02D2693:309b-1: gzi brjid che zhing rbad pa la dga' ste //
T02D2693:309b-2: de'i gzugs kyis sems can la gnod par byed pa'o //
T02D2693:309b-4: slob ma sna la rab tu 'phyang //
T02D2693:309b-6: glags btsal te dam tshig nyams pa la smad cing gnod pa che bar byas pa ste /
T02D2693:309b-7: de rnams kyis kyang chad pa gcod cing drag shul bstan pa'o //
T02D2693:309b-8: yan lag drug pa so bstan pa //
T02D2693:309b-9: gur gum mdog can tho ba 'dra //
T02D2693:309b-11: mgo bo drug phyag drug / rkang pa drug de bzhin du sprul pa ste /
T02D2693:309b-13: mche ba gtsigs shing so gcigs [*gtsigs?] shing sems can rnams la ston par byed pa'o //
T02D2693:309b-14: so yang rtsub cing rno ba dang //
T02D2693:309b-15: mdung thung gsal zhing 'jigs par bgyid //
T02D2693:309b-17: sems can la gnod par byed pa'i dus su ni mtshon cha sna tshogs bstan te //
T02D2693:309b-18: so rno zhing sems can smad pa la dga' ba'o //
T02D2693:309b-19: glang chen mgo dang bum rna can //
T02D2693:309b-20: mgo bo seng ge stag dang 'dra //
T02D2693:309b-22: gzugs sna tshogs par sprul zhing sems can rnams la 'jigs par byed pa ste /
T02D2693:309b-23: de rnams mi srun zhing gnod par byed pa la dga' ba'o//
T02D2693:309b-24: lcags kyi so can lcags kyi skra //
T02D2693:309b-25: gdon rnams rnam par skrag bgyid pa //
T02D2693:309b-27: mtshon gyi so dang khab kyi skra ste /
T02D2693:309b-28: de bzhin du lus po'i ba spu rnams kyang yin no //
T02D2693:309b-29: nang la nang 'thab 'dod cing sems can gyi lus la zhugs nas kyang de bzhin no //
T02D2693:309b-30: lag na lcags kyi gtun bu thogs //
T02D2693:309b-31: lag na lcags kyi tho ba thogs //
T02D2693:309b-33: gdon de rnams kyang 'thab pa'i dus su de bzhin te /
T02D2693:309b-34: de'i tshul gyis bstan zhing sems can la 'thab rtsod rngod par byed pa'o //
T02D2693:309b-35: so rnon lag pa ring ba ste //
T02D2693:309b-36: 'jigs pa'i gzugs can lcags kyi mchu //
T02D2693:309b-38: za ba'i dus su so rno ba //
T02D2693:309b-39: gnod par byed pa lag ring ba //
T02D2693:309b-40: yang na lag pa ring ba ni phyogs gcig na bsdad nas dpag tshad brgyar slebs pa'o //
T02D2693:309b-41: drag po'i tshul du bstan zhing mtshon gyi mchu dang ldan pa'o //
T02D2693:310a-1: bo che la skra g-yengs pa //
T02D2693:310a-2: nag cing mig ser sna zhom pa //
T02D2693:310a-4: yan lag phra zhing bong thung ba ste /
T02D2693:310a-5: mgo bo che la bzhin mi sdug ste /
T02D2693:310a-6: sol ba'i mdog la mig la me 'bar te /
T02D2693:310a-7: sna med cing sug sug byed pa de'i gzugs kyis gnod par byed pa'o ;
T02D2693:310a-8: / bum pa'i mgrin dang mig dmar pa //
T02D2693:310a-9: mig gcig pa dang lto bo che //
T02D2693:310a-11: bum pa 'dra ba'i lba ba gsum yod pa ste /
T02D2693:310a-12: de'i lus la mig dmar ba'o //
T02D2693:310a-13: mig gcig sbrul gyi mgo can te /
T02D2693:310a-14: stobs dang ldan zhing sa bdag gi gzugs su gnas pa'o//
T02D2693:310a-15: mchu 'phyang po dang lag gcig pa //
T02D2693:310a-16: rkang gcig pa dang rkang gnyis pa //
T02D2693:310a-18: chu srin gyi mchu dang ldan pa /
T02D2693:310a-19: lus la lag pa gcig med cing 'jigs su rung ba ste /
T02D2693:310a-20: la la yang rkang pa re re yod cing gnyis gnyis 'grogs nas 'gro ba'o //
T02D2693:310a-21: gzhan yang khro bo'i tshul du yod pa la rkang pa gnyis dang ldan pa'o //
T02D2693:310a-22: kha med kha gnyis drag po ste //
T02D2693:310a-23: mi rnams rab tu 'jigs par bgyid //
T02D2693:310a-25: khab kyi kha la gsus po che ste /
T02D2693:310a-26: kha yang kha ltag khung na yang kha yod pas kha gnyis yod pa ste /
T02D2693:310a-27: de bzhin du mi rnams la yang gnod pa ste /
T02D2693:310a-28: drag po'i tshul gyis gnod par byed pa'o //
T02D2693:310a-29: lag na 'khar ba dbyug pa thogs //
T02D2693:310a-30: mdud rtse gsum ba drag cing 'jigs //
T02D2693:310a-32: gdon ma rungs pa rnams la ni /
T02D2693:310a-33: mtshon cha sna tshogs thogs shing mi rnams la 'jigs par byed pa ste /
T02D2693:310a-34: de bzhin du 'tshe ba drag po byed pa'o //
T02D2693:310a-35: skrag cing 'jigs par byed pa ste //
T02D2693:310a-36: gdon rnams rnam par skrag bgyid pa //
T02D2693:310a-38: drag po'i tshul gyis gnod par byed de de bzhin
T02D2693:310a-39: du gdon sna tshogs kyis nad sna tshogs btang nas
T02D2693:310a-41: skrag par bgyid cing smra bar bgyid //
T02D2693:310a-42: sems kyang 'khrugs par byed pa ste //
T02D2693:310a-44: nad kyis thebs shing lab lob smrar 'jug pa ste /
T02D2693:310a-45: yang na sems can de smyos par byas nas sems gtong zhing kha'i kha bden smra ba'o //
T02D2693:310b-0: smyo bar @310b bgyid cing rmongs par bgyid //
T02D2693:310b-1: de nas gzi brjid 'phrog par bgyid //
T02D2693:310b-3: gdon gyis btab pa de ni 'bog ste /
T02D2693:310b-5: de bzhin du ngag kyang mad do //
T02D2693:310b-6: lus de yang nyon mongs shing dpal dang mi ldan de /
T02D2693:310b-7: de bzhin du gnod sbyin gyi gdon gyis btab pa'o //
T02D2693:310b-9: stobs po che la brten par dka' //
T02D2693:310b-11: de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad la
T02D2693:310b-12: sems can gyis sems can la gnod par byas te
T02D2693:310b-13: / 'jigs shing skrag par byed pa'i phyir na /
T02D2693:310b-14: rig sngags kyi rgyal mo bsil ba'i tshal la brten pa'o //
T02D2693:310b-15: stong phrag drug cu rtsa bzhi po //
T02D2693:310b-16: rgyal po chen po'i mdun na rgyug / ces bya ba ni /
T02D2693:310b-17: gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon lus ngan po'i mdun du rgyug ste /
T02D2693:310b-18: de dag 'jigs nas skyabs gsol ba'o //
T02D2693:310b-19: de 'dra'i gnod sbyin mang po yi //
T02D2693:310b-20: g-yog 'khor dag gis yongs su bskor //
T02D2693:310b-22: lus ngan po dang thabs cig tu //
T02D2693:310b-23: sangs rgyas ga la ba der 'khor de /
T02D2693:310b-24: gus par bskyed nas thabs cig tu'o //
T02D2693:310b-25: gnod sbyin bye ba stong phrag rnams //
T02D2693:310b-26: de dag phyag 'tshal slad du mchis //
T02D2693:310b-28: 'khor g-yog bdag cag sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun la skyabs su mchis te /
T02D2693:310b-29: gus par byas nas rig sngags la phyag 'tshal ba'o //
T02D2693:310b-30: goo tam dpa' bo khyod la ni //
T02D2693:310b-31: chos bzhin mthun par lta zhing mchis //
T02D2693:310b-33: bdung bzhi bcom pa la dpa' bo ste /
T02D2693:310b-34: de bzhin du mun pa mun nag bsal te /
T02D2693:310b-35: 'jig rten las 'das nas sems can rnams kyi don byed pa ste /
T02D2693:310b-36: bdag cag gi sems kyis sems can rnams la 'tshe bar mi byed de /
T02D2693:310b-37: rig sngags bdag gis gzung bar bya //
T02D2693:310b-38: sa ga lngas rtsen zla ba dang //
T02D2693:310b-39: seng ge sde dang rab gnon dang //
T02D2693:310b-41: de yang gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon nyi shu rtsa gnyis yin te /
T02D2693:310b-42: de rnams kyi ming grangs ni gsang sngags che dang la ba la sogs pa'o //
T02D2693:310b-43: rig pa stobs chen nor bu dang //
T02D2693:311a-1: la ba la sogs pa'i bar nas 'di dag yin te /
T02D2693:311a-2: gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon nyi shu rtsa gnyis de
T02D2693:311a-3: yang stobs dang ldan zhing gzi brjid che ba ste
T02D2693:311a-4: / kha dog dang ldan zhing rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa /
T02D2693:311a-5: lha dang lha ma yin gyi rtsod pa las rtsod par nus te /
T02D2693:311a-6: gnod sbyin de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa srung zhing /
T02D2693:311a-7: rig sngags la rjes su yi rang ba'o //
T02D2693:311a-8: 'jog po nag po chen po dang //
T02D2693:311a-9: la ba can dang rje'u gnyis //
T02D2693:311a-11: klu'i rgyal bo klu rigs bzhi yin te /
T02D2693:311a-12: de dag kyang sa dang chu la gnas shing bstan pa bsrung ba'o //
T02D2693:311a-13: klu yi rgyal po sa srung bu //
T02D2693:311a-14: yan lag chen po rdzu 'phrul che //
T02D2693:311a-16: stobs dang ldan zhing kha dog dang ldan te /
T02D2693:311a-17: sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa srung zhing 'jigs pa med cing /
T02D2693:311a-19: nam mkha' lding ni shugs chen ldan //
T02D2693:311a-20: 'dab chags kun gyi mchog gyur pa //
T02D2693:311a-22: nam mkha' lding gi rgyal po gser mig can yin te /
T02D2693:311a-23: 'dab chags bya ba la gzugs che zhing stobs dang ldan pa'o //
T02D2693:311a-24: bya yi shugs kyis 'chi bgyid cing //
T02D2693:311a-25: rgya mtsho kun du 'khrug par bgyid //
T02D2693:311a-27: sems can des klu'i sems can rnams la 'jigs par byed de /
T02D2693:311a-28: de yang de dag rnams kyis kyang //
T02D2693:311a-29: 'tshe bar byed pa'i rgyu la gnas pa'o //
T02D2693:311a-30: lha dang lha min dri za rnams //
T02D2693:311a-31: 'jigs bgyid pa dang dge ba'ang rung ;
T02D2693:311a-33: phan byed dang gnod byed gnyis nus te /
T02D2693:311a-34: de rnams kyis kyang phan par byed pa dang /

T02D2693:318b-8: skyob pa la sogs pa byed par 'gyur ro //
T02D2693:318b-9: de skad ces gsol ba dang zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2693:318b-10: de dag ni rgyal po chen po bzhi po de dag gis smras pa'o //
T02D2693:318b-11: bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po chen po bzhi la
T02D2693:318b-12: 'di skad ces bka' stsal to zhes bya ba ni
T02D2693:318b-15: btang snyoms kyis khyab pa'i sems kyis sems can gyi
T02D2693:318b-16: don la rgyal po chen po bzhi la bka' stsal
T02D2693:318b-17: pa'o // kye rgyal po chen po dag / rig
T02D2693:318b-18: sngags kyi rgyal po chen po bzung zin no zhes
T02D2693:318b-19: pa'o // bya ba ni / bcom ldan 'das kyis
T02D2693:318b-20: kyang rgyal po chen po byin gyis brlabs nas rig
T02D2693:318b-23: rig sngags kyi tshig rgyal po chen po bzhi'i zhal nas smras par bgyid pa'o //
T02D2693:318b-24: bsil ba'i tshal gyi mdo chen po ngas yongs su bzung zin no zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2693:318b-25: bskal pa grangs med pa'i sngon rol du rig sngags
T02D2693:318b-26: kyi rgyal mo bsil ba'i tshal 'di dag thugs la
T02D2693:318b-27: bzung ste / de bzhin du gsung dang skus kyang yin no //
T02D2693:318b-28: de bas na yongs su bzung ngo zhes bya ba'o //
T02D2693:318b-29: kye rgyal po chen po dag ces bya ba ni ;
T02D2693:318b-30: / bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po chen po bzhi la yang nas yang du bka' stsal ba'o //
T02D2693:318b-31: gzhan yang ngas kyang bsil ba'i tshal gyi mdo chen
T02D2693:318b-32: po rjes su yi rang ba'i zhes bya ba ni
T02D2693:318b-33: / 'das pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs la sogs pa
T02D2693:318b-34: bsam gyis mi khyab pas rjes su yi rang zhing
T02D2693:318b-36: de bzhin du ma 'ongs pa rnams kyang gsung bar 'gyur te /
T02D2693:318b-37: de yang byams pa la sogs pa bsam gyis mi
T02D2693:318b-38: khyab pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsung bar 'gyur ba'o
T02D2693:318b-39: // da ltar bdag gis kyang rjes su yi rang zhing gsungs pa'o //
T02D2693:319a-1: kyi rgyal mo chen mo brjod kyis de legs par
T02D2693:319a-2: rab tu nyon la yid la zung shing dang ngas
T02D2693:319a-3: brjod do zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2693:319a-4: gnyug ma'i rang bzhin gzhan gyi dri mas ma gos pa ste /
T02D2693:319a-5: rang bzhin med cing rnam par dag pa /
T02D2693:319a-7: mya ngan las 'das pa med cing nam mkha' bzhin du khyab pa ste /
T02D2693:319a-8: de lta bu'i rig pa nyon mongs pa rnams kyis
T02D2693:319a-9: zung shig bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad do zhes bya'o
T02D2693:319a-10: // bcom ldan 'das de ltar 'tshal zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2693:319a-12: stong pa nyid kyi don 'di rgyal po chen po bzhis kyang bzung nas /
T02D2693:319a-13: 'khor ba na 'khyams nas yod pa nyon mongs pa rnams la ston par bgyid do zhes bya ba'o //
T02D2693:319a-14: rgyal po chen po bzhis bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' la mnyan to zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2693:319a-15: rig sngags 'di'i cho ga ni ngo bo dang bral zhing rang bzhin med de /
T02D2693:319a-16: de lta bu'i ye shes kyi tshig ni mnyan to zhes bya ba'o ;
T02D2693:319a-17: / rig sngags kyi rgyal mo bsil ba'i tshal gyi
T02D2693:319a-18: las kyi rigs lnga bshad pa'i gnas skabs te bdun
T02D2693:319a-20: / de nas zhes bya ba ni rgyal po chen po bzhi la gtad pa'i de nas so //
T02D2693:319a-21: bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag rin po che g-yas pas
T02D2693:319a-22: na bza' chos gos phye nas 'byung po'i tshogs de
T02D2693:319a-23: dag la bka' stsal to zhes bya ba nas /
T02D2693:319a-24: rdo rje seng ge'i padma chen po'i khri la rdo
T02D2693:319a-25: rje skyil krung du ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya
T02D2693:319a-27: skyabs sbyin gyi phyag rgya bstan pa'o //
T02D2693:319a-28: chos gos de phye ba'i rgyu mtshan ni /
T02D2693:319a-30: rig sngags kyi rgyal mo bsil ba'i tshal bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs shing /
T02D2693:319a-31: 'byung po rnams rlag par byed pa'o //
T02D2693:319a-32: de'i phyir na chos gos phye ba zhes bya ba'o //
T02D2693:319a-33: rin chen phyag gis skyabs sbyin bstan pa ni /
T02D2693:319a-34: yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che bzhin du yod de /
T02D2693:319a-35: de lta bu'i chos kyi nyams myong sems can thams cad sangs rgyas shing /
T02D2693:319a-36: sdig can bdud kyi rig sngags la mi 'jigs pa bstan pa'o //
T02D2693:319a-37: sor mo re re la yang 'od zer sna tshogs
T02D2693:319a-38: dang ldan pa 'od zer de yang ye shes lnga'i
T02D2693:319a-40: ye shes lnga ni phung po lnga ste /
T02D2693:319a-41: phung po lnga ni rigs lnga /
T02D2693:319b-0: @319b khams lnga po de yang stong pa nyid du bsam mo //
T02D2693:319b-1: de lta bu'i phyag rgya 'byung po rnams la ston pa'o //
T02D2693:319b-2: bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rig sngags 'di bka' stsal pa'o //
T02D2693:319b-3: ngas 'di bstan par bya'o zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2693:319b-4: rig sngags kyi rang bzhin gyi ye shes ngo bo nyid nas dag pa ste /
T02D2693:319b-5: dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin brjod du med pa /
T02D2693:319b-6: ngag gis 'di yin zhes bya bar brjod par mi nus so //
T02D2693:319b-7: rig sngags kyi phyag rgya'i phyag rgya de ni rnam thos kyi bu la bstan te /
T02D2693:319b-8: de yang rgyal po bzhi'i gtso bo nas yin no //
T02D2693:319b-9: thams cad la go bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2693:319b-10: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams la sprul pa'i skus khyab ste /
T02D2693:319b-11: de lta bu'i sems can rnams kyis go bar byed pa'o //
T02D2693:319b-12: de nas zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2693:319b-13: rgyas par bshad pa de nas so //
T02D2693:319b-14: bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
T02D2693:319b-15: kyis rig sngags 'di bka' stsal to zhes bya ba
T02D2693:319b-16: ni / bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs ka nas h'um
T02D2693:319b-17: gi yi ge las 'od zer sna tshogs 'phros te
T02D2693:319b-18: ni / / 'od zer sna tshogs de yang 'gro ba rigs drug gi don byas te /
T02D2693:319b-19: 'od sna tshogs de yang bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs ka'i h'um la thim mo //
T02D2693:319b-20: h'um de'i yi ges bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs ka
T02D2693:319b-21: nas rig sngags kyi rgyal mo bsil ba'i tshal rdo
T02D2693:319b-22: rje'i rigs su sna la 'phros pa'o //
T02D2693:319b-23: de'i thugs ka nas kyang h'um gi yi ge las 'od zer sna tshogs snang ba'o //
T02D2693:319b-24: rig sngags 'di ni zhal bzhi pa /
T02D2693:319b-26: sku mdog nag mo khro mo'o //
T02D2693:319b-27: dbu skra ser po gyen du 'bar ba /
T02D2693:319b-28: thod pa lnga yis dbu la brgyan pa /
T02D2693:319b-29: dbu la rdo rje'i mtshan ma dang ldan pa /
T02D2693:319b-32: g-yon ljang gu / rgyab dmar po'o //
T02D2693:319b-33: zhal bzhi yang mche ba gtsigs pa /
T02D2693:319b-35: rgyan thams cad ni sprul gyis brgyan pa /
T02D2693:319b-36: phyag dang po'i g-yas g-yon gyis rdo rje snying gar 'dzin cing /
T02D2693:319b-37: g-yon gyis dril bu dkur brten zhing gnas pa'o //
T02D2693:319b-38: de'i 'og ma g-yas g-yon gnyis kyis chos kyi dbyings kyi phyag rgya dbu steng du mdzad pa'o //
T02D2693:319b-39: g-yas pa gsum na rdo rje /
T02D2693:319b-40: bzhi pa na ral gri / lnga pa na 'khor lo //
T02D2693:320a-3: lnga pa na lcags kyu de'i 'og ma g-yas g-yon gyis mda' gzhu 'gengs pa'o //
T02D2693:320a-4: thabs shes rab ngo bo nyid du bzhugs pa /
T02D2693:320a-5: rdo rje sems dpa'i rang bzhin mi bskyod pas rgyas btab pa /
T02D2693:320a-6: chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes te /
T02D2693:320a-7: de yang sgyu ma lta bu me long lta bu'i ye shes kyis brgyan pa'o //
T02D2693:320a-8: de gnyis kyi rang bzhin gyi ye shes lnga rgyas btab pa'o //
T02D2693:320a-9: mtshon pa ni ye shes lnga yin te /
T02D2693:320a-10: mtshon byed ni rig sngags kyi rgyal mo'o //
T02D2693:320a-11: phung po ni rnam par shes pa'i phung po'o //
T02D2693:320a-13: skye mched ni yid kyi skye mched /
T02D2693:320a-14: zhabs phyed skyil du bzhugs shing /
T02D2693:320a-16: gnod sbyin pho mo mnan pa /
T02D2693:320a-17: padma dang zla ba nyi ma'i gdan la bzhugs shing /
T02D2693:320a-18: bskal ba'i me ltar 'bar ba'i 'od dang ldan zhing /
T02D2693:320a-19: ma rig pa'i mun pa thams cad sreg pa'o //
T02D2693:320a-20: rig sngags kyi rdo rje'i snying po ni gang zhe na /
T02D2693:320a-23: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sh'akya thub pas bstan pa'o //
T02D2693:320a-24: de yang rdo rje'i snying po'o //
T02D2693:320a-25: hi l'i hi l'i bhi sa ni la sogs pa'o //
T02D2693:320a-26: bcom ldan 'das kyis rig sngags kyi rgyal mo 'di bka' stsal pa na zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2693:320a-27: rig sngags kyi rgyal mo 'di'i gzi brjid dang stobs dang /
T02D2693:320a-28: dpa' bas 'di'i gsang sngags bshad ma thag tu sa g-yo ba dang /
T02D2693:320a-30: sa ni kun du g-yos zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2693:320a-32: ji bzhin du g-yos she na /
T02D2693:320a-33: sa chen po 'di rnam pa drug tu g-yos /
T02D2693:320a-35: kun du rab tu g-yos so //
T02D2693:320a-38: ldeg rab tu ldeg / kun du rab tu ldeg chem chem rab tu che ma /
T02D2693:320a-39: kun du rab tu chem chem /
T02D2693:320a-42: shig shig rab tu shig shig / kun du rab tu shig shig ste /
T02D2693:320a-43: ltas chen po bco brgyad byung ba'o //
T02D2693:320a-44: des nas ni kun du g-yos zhes bya'o //
T02D2693:320a-45: rig sngags kyi gzi brjid kyis sa des kyang mi theg cing g-yos pa'o //
T02D2693:320b-0: 'byung po thams cad ni rab tu @320b 'dar nas zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2693:320b-1: skang kyang smra bar mi nus shing /
T02D2693:320b-2: lus kyang 'thoms nas ba spu yang gyen du log ste /
T02D2693:320b-3: 'jigs par byas nas 'bros pa'i tshul du bstan to //
T02D2693:320b-4: kye ma kyi hud kye ma sdug bsngal sgra chen po byung ngo zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2693:320b-5: 'byung po'i tshogs rnams kyang rab tu 'jigs nas 'byung
T02D2693:320b-6: po rnams rlag par byed do snyam nas skad chen
T02D2693:320b-7: po bton to // yang nas yang du skad ngan chen po bton to //
T02D2693:320b-8: srin po rnams kyis kyang 'di skad ces smras te zhes bya ba ni 'byung po dang bcas shing /
T02D2693:320b-9: bcom ldan 'das la zhu ba 'bul ba'o //
T02D2693:320b-10: 'di ltar yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyas //
T02D2693:320b-11: sems can kun la thugs brtse ba //
T02D2693:320b-13: rig sngags kyi rgyal mo'i lam nas kyang sangs rgyas te /
T02D2693:320b-14: de bzhin du bskal pa grangs med pa'i sngon du tshogs bsags te /
T02D2693:320b-15: tshogs bsags pa de yang sems can thams cad kyi don du bsngo ste /
T02D2693:320b-16: mnyam pa nyid kyis sems can kyi don na dzad [?] pa'o ;
T02D2693:320b-19: ces bya ba ni rig sngags kyi dmod mos ma
T02D2693:320b-20: rungs pa'i 'byung po rnams kyang bcom zhing thal bar
T02D2693:320b-21: rlog pa ste / de lta bu'i gzi brjid che
T02D2693:320b-22: ba'i rig sngags ni sangs rgyas sh'akya thub pa'i zhal
T02D2693:320b-23: rlog pa ste / nas gsungs pa'o // de nas kun mkhyen ston pa po //
T02D2693:320b-24: sems can kun la thugs brtse bas //
T02D2693:320b-26: de nas ni mtshams sbyor ba'i de nas so //
T02D2693:320b-27: chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong bstan te /
T02D2693:320b-28: de yang sems can rigs mi gcig pas theg pa sna tshogs bstan pa ste /
T02D2693:320b-29: 'khor ba'i sems can rnams la byams pa dang snying rjes khyab pa'o //
T02D2693:320b-30: gnod sbyin srin po dri za dang //
T02D2693:320b-31: klu dang mkha' lding gsang ba pa //
T02D2693:320b-33: sems can las kyi 'bras bu mi gcig pas /
T02D2693:320b-34: 'byung po'i lus su gzhan la gnod pa'i sems dang ldan par skyes te /
T02D2693:320b-36: byol song gi lus su skyes pa'o //
T02D2693:320b-37: 'byung po rgyu ba gzi brjid 'phrog / grul bum yi dags srul po dang //
T02D2693:320b-39: rgyu ba dang sems can phrad par gyur na /
T02D2693:320b-40: gti mug dang zhe sdang yod pas /
T02D2693:320b-41: sems can rnams la gzi brjid 'phrog ste /
T02D2693:321a-2: lha min gshed byed ro langs dang //
T02D2693:321a-3: brjed byed dang ni mi 'am ci //
T02D2693:321a-5: de rnams la bza' ba med cing skom pa'i sbyin pa ma btang zhing khro ba ste /
T02D2693:321a-6: la la yang mchod rdzas la sogs pa za bar
T02D2693:321a-7: yod pa ni sbyin pa gtong zhing khro bar byas
T02D2693:321a-8: pa'o // skems byed dang ni rims drag dang //
T02D2693:321a-9: de bzhin bram ze srin po dang //
T02D2693:321a-12: sems can gyi srog gcod cing /
T02D2693:321a-13: sbyin pa zad pa med pa btang ste /
T02D2693:321a-14: de'i 'bras bus kyang srin po la sogs par skye zhing snying rje med pa'o //
T02D2693:321a-15: smyo byed rims nad zhag gsum pa //
T02D2693:321a-16: de bzhin zhag ni bzhi pa rnams //
T02D2693:321a-20: rims de dag kyang rig sngags kyis 'joms shing 'byung
T02D2693:321a-21: po de rnams kyang rig sngags kyi dmod mos 'joms
T02D2693:321a-22: pa ste / gzhan yang nad rlung dang /
T02D2693:321a-24: mkhris pa las gyur pa bzhi brgya brgyad cu rtsa bzhi yang 'joms pa'o //
T02D2693:321a-25: skrag cing rab tu 'dar gyur te //
T02D2693:321a-26: phyogs bcur rgyug pa gzigs nas kyang //
T02D2693:321a-28: 'byung po'i tshogs rnams kyang rig sngags kyi gzi brjid mthong bas 'jigs shing skrag pa ste /
T02D2693:321a-29: phyogs bzhi nas kyang 'bros par 'gyur ro //
T02D2693:321a-30: de dag la ni thugs brtse'i phyir //
T02D2693:321a-31: rig sngags 'di ni rjod par mdzad //
T02D2693:321a-33: de dag kyang las kyi 'bras bus skyes te /
T02D2693:321a-34: de yang sangs rgyas thugs rje'i sems kyis sems can la 'bros par 'gyur ro //
T02D2693:321a-35: de dag kyang las kyi 'bras bus skyes te /
T02D2693:321a-36: de yang sangs rgyas thugs rje'i sems kyis sems can la mnyam pa nyid du khyab ste /
T02D2693:321a-37: de yang rig sngags kyi ngo bo ni /
T02D2693:321a-38: thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med pa ste /
T02D2693:321a-39: ye shes kyi rang bzhin chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes so //
T02D2693:321a-40: thabs kyi ngo bo nyid ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs te /
T02D2693:321a-41: phung po ni gzugs kyi phung po'o //
T02D2693:321a-43: skye ma ched ni mig gi skye mched do //
T02D2693:321a-44: ye shes lnga dang ldan zhing /
T02D2693:321a-45: sangs rgyas lnga'i dbu rgyan can /
T02D2693:321b-0: rgyan thams @321b cad kyis brgyan pa'o //
T02D2693:321b-3: sku mdog dkar mo zhal g-yas mthing ga / g-yon ljang gu / rgyab dmar pa'o //
T02D2693:321b-7: snying gar rdo rje brten zhing /
T02D2693:321b-8: g-yon dril bu dku la brten pa'o //
T02D2693:321b-9: de'i 'og ma g-yas pa gsum na ral gri dang /
T02D2693:321b-12: de bzhin du g-yon pa gsum na /
T02D2693:321b-16: zhabs rdo rje'i skyil krung du bzhugs shing /
T02D2693:321b-17: padma dang zla ba'i gdan la nyi ma'i 'od dang ldan pa'o //
T02D2693:321b-18: rig sngags bsil ba'i tshal de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi ngo bo yin no //
T02D2693:321b-19: de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po ni gang zhe na /
T02D2693:321b-21: rig sngags dang gsang sngags kyi tshig go //
T02D2693:321b-23: ti ri kha kha ka ta ma t'a la sogs pa'o //
T02D2693:321b-24: gsang sngags chen mo'i rig sngags chen mo 'di las 'gal bar ma byed cig ces bya ba ni /
T02D2693:321b-25: 'byung po la sogs pa rnams kyis kyang rig sngags
T02D2693:321b-26: las 'gal bar byed par gyur na tshe 'di la
T02D2693:321b-27: yang sdug bsngal drag po thob cing /
T02D2693:321b-28: phyi ma la yang dmyal bar skye bar 'gyur ro ;
T02D2693:321b-29: / bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung gi chos la yang
T02D2693:321b-30: dag par rtogs shig ces bya ba ni sangs rgyas
T02D2693:321b-31: kyi bka' la mi bden pa mi mnga' ste /
T02D2693:321b-32: de bzhin du rig sngags kyi gzi brjid kyang bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o //
T02D2693:321b-33: khyed kun lus zhig ste zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2693:321b-34: yang dag par rdzogs ba'i sangs rgyas kyi bka' las 'das shing /
T02D2693:321b-35: rig sngags la smra bar gyur na /
T02D2693:321b-36: mgo bo dang lus tshal ba brgyar 'gas shing /
T02D2693:321b-37: aa rdza ka'i manydza ra bzhin du 'gas te /
T02D2693:321b-38: tshe 'di la yang nad kyi sdug bsngal chen po theb par 'gyur ro //
T02D2693:321b-39: shi ba'i 'og tu ngan song ngan 'gro log par
T02D2693:321b-40: ltung ba sems can dmyal ba rnams su skye zhing
T02D2693:321b-41: 'khor bar 'gro ba re zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2693:321b-42: sangs rgyas dang rig sngags kyi bka' las 'das pa'i 'byung po rnams ni /
T02D2693:321b-43: shi 'phos ma thag tu mda' 'phangs pa bzhin du mnar mes sreg ste /
T02D2693:322a-0: gal te dmyal ba de nas @322a * //
T02D2693:322a-1: 'phos na yang dmyal ba gzhan du yang nas yang du skye bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2693:322a-2: rgyas par bshad pa'i de nas so //
T02D2693:322a-4: bcom ldan 'das kyi rig sngags kyi rgyal mo sngon
T02D2693:322a-5: ma thos pa 'di thos nas zhes bya ba ni
T02D2693:322a-6: gzhan gyis mi thub pa 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal thams
T02D2693:322a-7: cad bcom pa / stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin /
T02D2693:322a-9: 'byung po thams cad kyi gnyen po'o //
T02D2693:322a-10: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi yum /
T02D2693:322a-11: sems can rnams la khyad par 'phags pa 'di thos pa'o //
T02D2693:322a-13: mi dga' la skyi bung zhes byed nas /
T02D2693:322a-14: thal mo sbyar te zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2693:322a-15: rig sngags kyi dmod mos rgyal po chen po bzhi
T02D2693:322a-16: yang mdog shor zhing ba sbu rnams kyang gyen du

T02D2693:325b-31: / de'i mod la sdug bsngal bu ma byung ba dang brlag pa dang /
T02D2693:325b-32: mtha' med par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2693:325b-33: rig sngags kyi dmod mos sdug bsngal po 'byung ste /
T02D2693:325b-34: gar yang 'gros med cing lcang lo can gyi pho brang yang mi thob ste /
T02D2693:325b-35: de'i lus kyang zhig cing rul bar 'gyur ro ;
T02D2693:325b-36: /'brum bu'i gdon gang yin pa dang /
T02D2693:325b-37: skya rengs 'char ka'i gdon gang yin pa dang /
T02D2693:325b-38: grib gnon gyi gdon gang yin pa de dag kyang
T02D2693:325b-39: bsil ba'i tshal gyi mdo chen po 'di thos nas
T02D2693:326a-0: 'di 'don pa dang sgom pa dang yid la byed pa dang gdams ngag byin pa @326a * //
T02D2693:326a-3: rjes su yi rang zhing 'chang ba ste /
