T02D2693:326a-5: rig sngags kyi bka' las 'das pa'o //
T02D2693:326a-6: yang na rig sngags 'di mnyan nas /
T02D2693:326a-7: sems can la 'tshe bar mi bya'o //
T02D2693:326a-8: ming 'di zhes bya ba'i lus las myur du gud du dengs shig ces bya ba ni /
T02D2693:326a-9: gnod par byed pa de rnams gang zag dang sems
T02D2693:326a-10: can thams cad kyi don la myur du thon cig
T02D2693:326a-11: ces bya'o // yang na rig sngags kyi dmod mos sdug bsngal myur du thob po zhes bya'o //
T02D2693:326a-12: gal te myur du ma dong na 'jigs pa chen po dang /
T02D2693:326a-13: nad drag pos 'debs par 'gyur la zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2693:326a-14: rig sngags kyi bka' las 'das shing ma btang bar gyur na /
T02D2693:326a-15: rgyal po chen po bzhi'i chad pa'i 'jigs pa dang /
T02D2693:326a-16: g-yan pa'i nad la sogs pas myur du thebs par 'gyur ro //
T02D2693:326a-17: de'i rkyen gyis mgo bo dang snying tshal pa brgyar 'gas par 'gyur zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2693:326a-18: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bka' dang /
T02D2693:326a-19: rig sngags kyi dmod mos aardza ka'i mardza ri'i dogs pa bzhin du 'gas pa'o //
T02D2693:326a-20: de'i mod la sdug bsngal du ma 'byung ba dang /
T02D2693:326a-21: brlag pa dang mtha' med par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2693:326a-22: de bzhin du rig sngags kyis kyang dmod mos 'gros mi rnyed cing /
T02D2693:326a-23: de'i rnam par smin pas sdug bsngal drag po thob ste /
T02D2693:326a-24: shi nas kyang mnar med kyi mes bsreg cing /
T02D2693:326a-25: dmyal ba nas dmyal bar 'khor bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2693:326a-26: gzi byin dang ni khrag za ba //
T02D2693:326a-27: nyin mtshan rgyu ba gang yin pa //
T02D2693:326a-29: zas su khrag za ba dang sha za ba la
T02D2693:326a-30: sogs pa rnams kyis kyang gzi brjid 'phrog pa dang
T02D2693:326a-31: / sems can la 'tshe bar byed pa dang /
T02D2693:326a-32: nyin mo dang mtshan mo la sogs pa rgyu zhing ma byed cig ces bya'o //
T02D2693:326a-33: de dag gis kyang legs gsungs pa'i //
T02D2693:326a-34: mdo bshad thos nas spang bar gyis ;
T02D2693:326a-36: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis /
T02D2693:326a-37: rig sngags 'di yang yang dag par gsungs te /
T02D2693:326a-38: de bzhin du rgyal po chen po bzhi po rnams kyis kyang /
T02D2693:326a-39: rjes su yi rang zhing srung ba ste /
T02D2693:326b-0: de bzhin du khyad par du 'phags pa'i mdo 'di thos par gyur @326b nas ;
T02D2693:326b-1: sems can la gnod par byed pas sdug bsngal dpag tu med pa thob pa'o //
T02D2693:326b-2: de bas na spang bar gyis zhes bya ba'o //
T02D2693:326b-3: sha za lus 'phags skem byed dang //
T02D2693:326b-6: 'byung po de rnams kyis kyang sems can la gnod par byas te /
T02D2693:326b-7: de yang dam la btags nas gnod par byed pa spangs pa'o //
T02D2693:326b-8: de dag gis kyang legs gsungs pa'i //
T02D2693:326b-9: mdo 'di bshad pa thos nas mthong //
T02D2693:326b-10: zhes bya ba ni 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang /
T02D2693:326b-11: da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang gsungs te /
T02D2693:326b-12: de bzhin rgyal po bzhi po rnams kyis kyang dam tshig bsrung ste /
T02D2693:326b-13: rig sngags kyi gzi brjid kyis sdig can 'byung po
T02D2693:326b-14: de rnams kyis kyang gzhan la 'tshe ba spangs pa'o
T02D2693:326b-15: // lha dang lha min rlung lha dang //
T02D2693:326b-16: dri za dang ni gdon gyi bla //
T02D2693:326b-19: gti mug gis sems can thams cad la gnod par byas te /
T02D2693:326b-20: de yang rig sngags kyi gzi brjid dam pa thob pa'o //
T02D2693:326b-21: 'byung po dang ni sha za dang //
T02D2693:326b-22: de bzhin gnod sbyin srin po rnams //
T02D2693:326b-26: 'dod chags kyi sems can rnams la 'tshe bar byas te /
T02D2693:326b-27: de yang rig sngags kyi dmod mo'i 'jigs pas gnod mi nus pa'o //
T02D2693:326b-28: kun du 'khrugs shing kun du g-yos //
T02D2693:326b-29: skrag cing kun du rab tu 'gul //
T02D2693:326b-30: zhes bya ba ni rig sngags 'di'i gzi brjid dang /
T02D2693:326b-31: stobs kyis sa lan drug tu g-yos te /
T02D2693:326b-32: de bzhin du ltas chen po bco brgyad byung ba'o //
T02D2693:326b-33: kun du 'khrugs shing kun du g-yos pa ni shar dma' ste ;
T02D2693:326b-35: nub dma' na shar mtho ba'o //
T02D2693:326b-36: phyogs phyogs rnams kyang de bzhin no //
T02D2693:326b-37: mgo 'khrugs shing phyogs rnams gtor ba'o //
T02D2693:326b-38: de bas kyang skrag cing kun du 'gul ba ste /
T02D2693:326b-40: gdon dang gnod ba byed pa rnams //
T02D2693:326b-41: lhung zhing rab tu pha ma par 'gyur //
T02D2693:326b-43: sdig can bdud kyi rigs kyi 'byung po rnams ni /
T02D2693:326b-44: sems can la gnod par byed bas rang pham ste /
T02D2693:326b-45: sdug bsngal chen po thob cing rig sngags kyi dmod mos 'joms pa'o //
T02D2693:326b-46: sa gzhi dag kyang rab tu g-yos //
T02D2693:326b-47: sgra bo che yang sgrogs par byed //
T02D2693:327a-2: rig sngags kyi gzi brjid kyis /
T02D2693:327a-3: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
T02D2693:327a-4: sa g-yo zhing 'byung po rnams skrag bar byed de
T02D2693:327a-5: / sa de yang rnga bo che dang cha lang dang dril bu'i skad 'byung ngo //
T02D2693:327a-6: kun du rab tu 'byung ngo zhes bya'o //
T02D2693:327a-7: yi dags dang ni grul bum rnams //
T02D2693:327a-8: sdang ba'i gdon ni zlog byed pa'o //
T02D2693:327a-10: 'byung po de rnams kyang sems can drag pos gnod par byas te /
T02D2693:327a-11: gzhan gang gis kyang mi thub cing de'i gnyen po lta bu rig sngags kyi rgyal mo yin te /
T02D2693:327a-12: mdo 'di dag ni thos gyur na //
T02D2693:327a-15: gnod byed sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa dang sdig pa'i sems dang ldan pa dang /
T02D2693:327a-16: sems can gyi srog 'dod pa rnams /
T02D2693:327a-17: rig sngags kyi rgyal mo bsil ba'i tshal 'dis rlag par byed pa'o //
T02D2693:327a-18: sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun la //
T02D2693:327a-19: dad pa'i gnod sbyin gang yin pa //
T02D2693:327a-21: 'byung po byang chub sems dpa'i rigs yod de /
T02D2693:327a-22: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sh'akya thub pa dang /
T02D2693:327a-23: chos dang dge 'dun la dga' zhing 'jig rten gyi khams rnams skyong bar byed de /
T02D2693:327a-24: sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa bsrung zhing sems can rnams kyi don byed pa'o //
T02D2693:327a-25: rig sngags kyi rgyal mo bsil ba'i tshal 'di la
T02D2693:327a-26: rjes su yi rang zhing rig sngags kyi bka' las
T02D2693:327a-27: mi 'da' ba'o // de dag mgu zhing yid dga' nas //
T02D2693:327a-28: legs par rjes su yi rang ngo //
T02D2693:327a-30: byang chub sems dpa'i rigs 'byung de rnams kyang rig
T02D2693:327a-31: sngags kyi rgyal mo bsil ba'i tshal gyi chos la
T02D2693:327a-32: dga' zhing snga nas kyang chos la dad pa yod
T02D2693:327a-33: do // de ltar dad pa kun du rab tu skyes nas /
T02D2693:327a-34: dga' bas rab tu dga' ste /
T02D2693:327a-35: chos la mchod pa legs par ma chod nas //
T02D2693:327a-36: de rnams kyis rjes su yi rang ngo zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2693:327a-37: rig sngags kyi rgyal mo bsil ba'i tshal gyi 'byung
T02D2693:327a-38: po dam la btags pa'i gnas skabs te brgyad pa'o
T02D2693:327a-40: / // / de nas zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2693:327a-41: 'byung po dam la btags pa'i de nas so //
T02D2693:327a-42: rgyal po chen po bzhi bar snang las babs nas zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2693:327b-0: rgyal po chen po de yang @327b chos la rab tu dga' ste /
T02D2693:327b-1: bcom ldan 'das la snga nas kyang dad pa skyes te /
T02D2693:327b-2: da ltar yang rab tu skyes nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar phyin pa'o //
T02D2693:327b-3: bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste /
T02D2693:327b-4: lhags nas zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2693:327b-5: so so rang gi 'od zer yang 'phags te /
T02D2693:327b-6: bsil ba tshal gyi chos 'di la dad pa yang nas yang du skyes te /
T02D2693:327b-7: de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das la yang de bzhin no //
T02D2693:327b-8: de bas na rgyal po chen po bzhis kyang legs lhags pa zhes bya ba'o //
T02D2693:327b-9: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2693:327b-10: rgyal po chen po bzhi rab tu dga' nas zhabs kyi padma la gus pas phyag 'tshal ba'o //
T02D2693:327b-11: thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal zhing zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2693:327b-12: rgyal po chen po bzhis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan
T02D2693:327b-13: sngar pus mo g-yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs
T02D2693:327b-14: te / de nas bcom ldan 'das la thal mo sbyar ba'o //
T02D2693:327b-17: skad mthun par bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
T02D2693:327b-18: gsol to zhes bya ba ni dbyangs gcig tu byas
T02D2693:327b-19: shing / rgyal po chen po rnams kyis kyang rig
T02D2693:327b-20: sngags kyi chos la gus pa'i sems kyis bcom ldan
T02D2693:327b-22: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bsil ba'i tshal gyi mdo
T02D2693:327b-23: chen po 'di ni zhes bya ba ni srung ba
T02D2693:327b-26: sems can thams cad la rig sngags kyi gsang sngags kyis khyab ste /
T02D2693:327b-27: sdang ba'i sems zhi bar byed pa 'khor ba rnams
T02D2693:327b-28: bcom zhing yang dag pa'i ye shes kyi lam bstan
T02D2693:327b-29: pa'o // rgyal po chen po bzhis zhabs la phyag
T02D2693:327b-30: bgyi ba dang zhes bgyi ba ni gus phar bya
T02D2693:327b-32: rgyal po chen po bzhis kyang rang bsrung zhing /
T02D2693:327b-35: lus kyis bcang bar byas te /
T02D2693:327b-36: rig sngags 'di yang btags nas kyang /
T02D2693:327b-37: ngan song gsum du mi 'gro zhing byang chub kyi lam bstan pa'o //
T02D2693:327b-38: 'khor bzhi po rnams la bsrung ba dang zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2693:328a-1: ma la sogs pa'i sems can rnams kyang bsrung ba'i dam pa'o //
T02D2693:328a-2: yongs su skyob pa dang zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2693:328a-3: gzhan las kyang khyad par du 'phags te /
T02D2693:328a-4: zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur zhing sdug bsngal thams cad dang bral ba'o //
T02D2693:328a-5: gnod sbyin dang srin po nas gnod par bgyid pa'i
T02D2693:328a-6: bar rnams 'joms pa lags so zhes bya ba ni
T02D2693:328a-7: / ma rungs pa bdud kyi rigs rnams kyi 'byung po de yang 'joms shing rig sngags dang /
T02D2693:328a-8: gsang sngags kyi dmod mos rlag par byed pa'o //
T02D2693:328a-9: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2693:328a-10: rgyal po chen po bzhi dag gis kyang bcom ldan
T02D2693:328a-11: 'das la rig sngags 'di 'dri bar byed pa ste
T02D2693:328a-12: / de yang 'khor bzhi la rtag tu srung bar byed pa'o //
T02D2693:328a-16: dge bsnyen ma de dag gis kyang zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2693:328a-17: bcom ldan 'das la rtag tu 'khor ba'i 'khor bzhi yin te /
T02D2693:328a-18: rig sngags kyis kyang de dag srung zhing bar gcod bsal te rtag tu bde ba thob pa'o //
T02D2693:328a-19: bsil ba'i tshal gyi mdo chen po 'di gzung bar bgyi /
T02D2693:328a-22: kun chub par bgyi'o zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2693:328a-23: rig sngags kyi rgyal mo bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'di dur khrod chen po yi dags dang /
T02D2693:328a-25: mi'i sems can rnams kyi ston pa /
T02D2693:328a-26: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams skyong bar byed pa ste /
T02D2693:328a-27: 'khor bzhi po dag gis kyang 'chang ba dang /
T02D2693:328a-28: bzung nas kyang sems can thams cad la bstan nas /
T02D2693:328a-29: sdug bsngal thams cad dang 'bral bar byed pa ste /
T02D2693:328a-30: 'khor bzhi po dag gis kyang lus ngag yid gzung ba'o //
T02D2693:328a-31: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2693:328a-32: rgyal po bzhis kyang bcom ldan 'das la yang dang yang du zhu ba 'bul ba'o //
T02D2693:328a-36: dge bsnyen ma gang la la zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2693:328a-38: sems can thams cad la bsrung zhing sdug bsngal thams cad dang 'bral bar byed de /
T02D2693:328b-0: 'di'i lam nas kyang byang chub @328b kyi tshogs bstan pa'o //
T02D2693:328b-4: gzhan sba ba'i slad du zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2693:328b-5: gang zag rig sngags 'chang ba dang /
T02D2693:328b-6: nyon mongs ba'i sems can rnams srung ba ste /
T02D2693:328b-8: snying rje'i lam nas bdag gis kyang sems can gyi don la bstan par bya'o //
T02D2693:328b-9: bsil ba'i tshal gyi mdo chen po 'di 'dzin pa dang /
T02D2693:328b-12: kun chub par bgyid pa de la ni zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2693:328b-13: stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin /
T02D2693:328b-14: thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med pa ste /
T02D2693:328b-17: sprul pa'i skus khyab pa ste /
T02D2693:328b-18: de bzhin du 'di la gus pa byas pa'i gang zag ni /
T02D2693:328b-19: sdug bsngal thams cad dang 'bral ba'o //
T02D2693:328b-21: srin po nas gnod par bgyid ba'i bar rnams nye 'khor yang gnas par mi 'gyur na /
T02D2693:328b-22: gnod par bgyid pa ltag la sems lags zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2693:328b-23: mthu che zhing gzi brjid che ba ste /
T02D2693:328b-24: dpa' ba stobs che zhing sems can rnams la byams pa dang /
T02D2693:328b-25: snying rje dang ldan pa ste /
T02D2693:328b-26: gang zag 'di 'chang ba la da lta'i rkyen lta ci smos te /
T02D2693:328b-27: tshe phyi ma la yang de bzhin no //
T02D2693:328b-28: de gang du mtshan gcig tsam gnas pa der yang zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2693:328b-29: rig sngags kyi rgyal mo bsil ba'i tshal 'di yang grong ngam /
T02D2693:328b-32: ljongs la sogs pa la yi ge gcig tsam yang dag par gyur na /
T02D2693:328b-34: yi dags la sogs pas gnod par mi 'gyur te /
T02D2693:328b-35: grong dan gnas pa'i sems can rnams la yang khrag khrug dang /
T02D2693:328b-37: rims drag po'i nad mi 'byung ste /
T02D2693:328b-38: gzhan gyi rgyal po'i chad pa yang mi 'byung ngo //
T02D2693:328b-40: srin po nas gnod par bgyid pa'i bar rnams nyen
T02D2693:328b-41: kor du yang gnod par mi 'gyur zhes bya ba
T02D2693:328b-42: ni / mtshan de yang lus la btags pa'am /
T02D2693:328b-46: mchod rten gyi rtse mo la btags nas /
T02D2693:329a-1: de'i 'od zer gyi gzi brjid kyis rgyang grags kyi
T02D2693:329a-2: bar tshun chad du yang nye bar mi nus so
T02D2693:329a-3: // de gang du rtag tu gnas pa der lta smos kyang ci 'tshal lags zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2693:329a-4: rig sngags 'di yad 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bsam gyis
T02D2693:329a-5: mi khyab pa rnams kyis rjes su yi rang zhing
T02D2693:329a-6: gsungs pa'o // de bzhin du ma 'ongs pa rnams kyis kyang gsung bar 'gyur ba'o //
T02D2693:329a-7: da ltar yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sh'akya thub pas /
T02D2693:329a-8: sems can gyi don la gsungs pa ste /
T02D2693:329a-10: nges par the tshom med do zhes bya ba'o //
T02D2693:329a-11: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gang la la mi ma
T02D2693:329a-12: lags pa'i gnod pas thebs pa'i mdun du bsil ba'i
T02D2693:329a-13: tshal gyi mdo chen po 'di brjod na zhes bya
T02D2693:329a-14: ba ni / yul 'khor bsrung ba dang /
T02D2693:329a-16: ro langs kyi nad kyis btab pa dang /
T02D2693:329a-18: bri nyes la sogs pa gso ba dang /
T02D2693:329a-19: bkra mi shis pa bkra shis par byed pa dang /
T02D2693:329a-20: gzhan yang de la sogs pa thams cad la sngags te /
T02D2693:329a-21: gzhan yang mkha' la rgyu ba'i yi dags rnams bzlog pa'o cho ga yang dag par bshad par bya'o //
T02D2693:329a-22: lci ba chu dang 'dres pa yis //
T02D2693:329a-23: dkyil 'khor yang dag byug par bya //
T02D2693:329a-24: nad pa'i mdun du yang dag tu //
T02D2693:329a-25: de bzhin gzhan yang mkhas pa shes /
T02D2693:329a-26: sa tshon ldas ni yang dag tu //
T02D2693:329a-27: rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor mdzes par bris //
T02D2693:329a-28: dbus su sna tshogs padma la //
T02D2693:329a-29: phyi rim rdo rje ra ba ste//
T02D2693:329a-30: de phyir 'khor lo sna tshogs rtsibs //
T02D2693:329a-31: de phyir lha snam zlum por bri //
T02D2693:329a-32: de yi phyi rim gru bzhi la //
T02D2693:329a-33: lha snam padma r'a ga'i mdog / gru bzhi sgo bzhi ka ba brgyad //
T02D2693:329a-34: tva ra bzhi yis yang dag brgyan //
T02D2693:329a-35: dra ba la sogs brgyan pa la //
T02D2693:329a-36: rin chen sna bdun gzhal yas khang ;
T02D2693:329a-37: / gdugs dang ba dan de bzhin rgyan //
T02D2693:329a-38: mdzes pas yang dag rnam par brgyan //
T02D2693:329a-40: ye shes lha dang 'jig rten lha //
T02D2693:329a-41: gzhan yang gsungs pa de bzhin du //
T02D2693:329a-42: mkhas pa'i blo yis shes par bya //
T02D2693:329b-0: bzhi ba'i dbus su yang @329b dag tu //
T02D2693:329b-1: rnam par rgyal ba dbus su gzhag / lto ba ldir ba rke ba ring //
T02D2693:329b-2: mchu 'phyangs mtshan ma legs pa la //
T02D2693:329b-3: nag po ra ri rtsa ba spangs //
T02D2693:329b-4: de lta bu yi bum pa la //
T02D2693:329b-5: gu gul la sogs bdug par bya //
T02D2693:329b-6: rin chen 'bru lnga sman lnga dang //
T02D2693:329b-7: dri lnga byang chub shing lnga dang //
T02D2693:329b-8: mgul chings dang ni gdugs dang ni //
T02D2693:329b-9: me tog phreng dang rin chen phreng //
T02D2693:329b-10: gzhan yang ji snyed yang dag brgyan //
T02D2693:329b-11: de bzhin rgyal ba'i bum pa'i gzugs //
T02D2693:329b-12: gzhal yas khang gi dbus su gzhag / rims nad phyugs nad gang yin pa //
T02D2693:329b-13: de ni bkra shis la sogs dang //
T02D2693:329b-14: dbang bskur sbyin sreg de bzhin te //
T02D2693:329b-15: lha dang rab gnas de bzhin shes //
T02D2693:329b-16: rdo rje slob dpon mkhas pa yis //
T02D2693:329b-17: dkyil chog blo yis yang dag shes //
T02D2693:329b-18: grog shing shun dar sogs la //
T02D2693:329b-19: gur gum gi wang la sogs bri //
T02D2693:329b-20: phyi rim mu khyud ra ba la //
T02D2693:329b-21: rgyal ba'i mtshan ni yang dag bri //
T02D2693:329b-22: dar gyis bcings pa'i padma la /
T02D2693:329b-23: de steng phyag mtshan rgyas pa bri //
T02D2693:329b-24: ral gri skyabs sbyin rin chen dang //
T02D2693:329b-25: rin chen steng du rdo rje gnas //
T02D2693:329b-26: zhags pa lcags kyu bum pa dang //
T02D2693:329b-27: de steng rdo rje yang dag gnas//
T02D2693:329b-28: mtshams bzhi rdo rje rgya gram yin //
T02D2693:329b-29: be con dang ni autpala dang //
T02D2693:329b-31: gzhan yang phyag mtshan gang yod pa //
T02D2693:329b-32: mkhas pas brtags nas bri bar bya //
T02D2693:329b-33: de nas mu khyud zlum po la //
T02D2693:329b-34: rdo rje rgya gram yang dag bri //
T02D2693:329b-35: rdo rje rgya gram bar du ni //
T02D2693:329b-36: las kyi snying po yang dag bri //
T02D2693:329b-37: phyag mtshan bar du rdo rje rigs kyi yi ge dgod //
T02D2693:329b-38: de nas mu khyud gsum po la //
T02D2693:329b-39: sngar gsungs las kyi snying po bri //
T02D2693:329b-40: de nas mu khyud 'khor lo bri //
T02D2693:329b-41: 'khor lor bri ba'i yi ge ni //
T02D2693:329b-42: rig sngags skyed byed yang dag tu //
T02D2693:329b-43: h'um dang phat kyis rnam par brgyan //
T02D2693:329b-44: de nas mu khyud gsum po la //
T02D2693:329b-45: rig sngags snying po yang dag bri //
T02D2693:329b-47: yang snying snying po bri bar bya //
T02D2693:329b-48: de bzhin mu khyud bskor ba la //
T02D2693:329b-49: gzhan gyis mi thub snying po bri //
T02D2693:329b-50: de dbus yi ge gnas pa ni //
T02D2693:330a-1: ba'i tshal gyi bskyed yig bri //
T02D2693:330a-2: yi ge'i nang du mkhas pa ni //
T02D2693:330a-3: yang dag gis ni bri bar bya //
T02D2693:330a-4: de bzhin rig sngags 'chang bris la //
T02D2693:330a-5: mgul lam phyag sogs gdags par bya //
T02D2693:330a-6: de bzhin btags par gyur na ni //
T02D2693:330a-7: nad dang 'jigs pas mi tshugs te //
T02D2693:330a-8: mya ngan la sogs de bzhin du /
T02D2693:330a-9: mi rigs thams cad mi tshugs so //
T02D2693:330a-10: tshe ring sdug bsngal thams cad med /
T02D2693:330a-11: ngan sogs gsum yang de bzhin no //
T02D2693:330a-12: rgyal ba'i bsrung ba yang dag tu //
T02D2693:330a-13: nga yis yang dag bshad par bgyi //
T02D2693:330a-14: rdo rje'i ra ba gur dang ni //
T02D2693:330a-15: bla res sa gzhi dra ba dang //
T02D2693:330a-16: rdo rje'i rang bzhin shes bar bya //
T02D2693:330a-17: de phyir me ri sna tshogs kyis //
T02D2693:330a-18: yang dag gis ni bskor ba'o //
T02D2693:330a-20: de bzhin yag dag bri bar bya //
T02D2693:330a-21: ring bsrel gsung rten lugs ma'am //
T02D2693:330a-22: tsha tsha la sogs mchod rten gang //
T02D2693:330a-23: nad pa'i mdun du yang dag mchod //
T02D2693:330a-24: rig sngags bsil ba'i tshal gyi gzungs//
T02D2693:330a-25: cho ga'i dus su yang dag gdon //
T02D2693:330a-26: bar gyis mi chod de bzhin du //
T02D2693:330a-27: bzlas pa la sogs de bzhin bya //
T02D2693:330a-28: phyogs skyong gza' dang rgyu skar dang //
T02D2693:330a-29: de bzhin 'byung po la sogs la //
T02D2693:330a-30: rjes su mthun par dbul bar bya //
T02D2693:330a-31: dri dang me tog sbos dang ni //
T02D2693:330a-32: aarga la sogs yang dag dbul //
T02D2693:330a-33: de bzhin mkhas pas thun gtor du //
T02D2693:330a-34: yang dag gis ni dbul bar bya //
T02D2693:330a-35: nad pa la sogs khrus byas la //
T02D2693:330a-36: rig sngags gtad pa'i cho ga bya //
T02D2693:330a-37: dbang bskur la sogs gzhan yang mthun //
T02D2693:330a-38: de bzhin sngom pa 'bogs pa dang //
T02D2693:330a-39: gzhan dang la sogs mthun pa ste //
T02D2693:330a-40: de bzhin la sogs byas na ni //
T02D2693:330a-42: rig sngags kyi rgyal mo bsil ba'i tshal gyi dkyil
T02D2693:330a-43: 'khor dang bsrung ba bshad pa'i gnas skabs te dgu
T02D2693:330a-45: / de myur ba kho nar bde legs dang nad ma mchis pa dang zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2693:330a-46: de bzhin du dkyil 'khor la sogs pas bsrung ba byas na //
T02D2693:330a-47: sdug bsngal thams cad dang bral te /
T02D2693:330a-48: ma rungs ba'i gdon thams cad kyang de bzhin no //
T02D2693:330a-49: bde bar 'gyur zhing thar bar 'gyur la zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2693:330a-50: tshe da lta dang phyi ma la yang bde bar 'gyur ba ste /
T02D2693:330a-51: 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal thams cad las thar ba'o //
T02D2693:330a-52: mi ma lags pa rnams de la logs mi bgyid cing /
T02D2693:330a-53: myur du 'tshe bar 'gyur lags te zhes bya ba
T02D2693:330b-0: ni 'di 'chang @330b ba'i gang zag rnams la 'byung
T02D2693:330b-1: po de rnams grogs mi byed na 'byung po de
T02D2693:330b-2: rnams kyang rig sngags kyi dmod mos sdug bsngal drag
T02D2693:330b-4: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2693:330b-5: rgyal po bzhis bcom ldan das la zhus pa'o //
T02D2693:330b-6: bsil ba'i tshal gyi mdo che po 'di ni /
T02D2693:330b-7: de ltar do na che ba lags so zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2693:330b-8: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams la //
T02D2693:330b-9: sems can rnams la bde bar gnas par byas shing
T02D2693:330b-10: tshe da ltar dang phyi ma'i sdug bsngal zhi bar
T02D2693:330b-12: dge slong ngam dge slong ma gang la la sogs
T02D2693:330b-13: pa ni yang nas yang du bcom ldan 'das la
T02D2693:330b-14: / rgyal po bzhis zhu ba 'bul ba ste /
T02D2693:330b-15: de yang 'khor bzhi'i don la zhu ba 'bul ba'o //
T02D2693:330b-16: bsil ba'i tshal gyi mdo chen mo 'di 'dzin pa dang zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2693:330b-17: grong ngam grong khyer ram grong rdal lam //
T02D2693:330b-18: de la sogs pa la yod pa tsam gyis kyang 'jigs pa thams cad dang 'bral bar 'gyur te /
T02D2693:330b-19: 'chang ba dang zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2693:330b-20: mgul du btags nas gus par byas par gyur na /
T02D2693:330b-21: rig sngags kyi rgyal mo 'di'i nus bas sdug bsngal thams cad las thar bar 'gyur te /
T02D2693:330b-22: tshe da lta dang tshe phyi ma de bzhin no //
T02D2693:330b-23: brjod pa dang zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2693:330b-24: klog pa bsgom pa rjes su yi rang ba de la bshad par byed pa /
T02D2693:330b-25: de la sogs pa byas par gyur na de bzhin du sdug bsngal dang bral bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2693:330b-26: kun chub par bgyid pa dang zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2693:330b-27: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can gyi don la khyab pa'o //
T02D2693:330b-28: yang na rig pa ni nam mkha' bzhin du khyab pa ste /
T02D2693:330b-29: sems can gyi don la khyab pa'o //
T02D2693:330b-30: sbyor bar bgyid pa de la ni zhes bya ba
T02D2693:330b-31: ni 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar
T02D2693:330b-32: yod pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs pa /
T02D2693:330b-33: rig sngags kyi rgyal mo bsil ba'i tshal 'di ni rjes su yi rang zhing gsungs pa'o //
T02D2693:330b-34: de dag gi gang zag ni sdug bsngal thams cad
T02D2693:330b-35: dang bral zhing de bzhin dus gsum du yin na
T02D2693:330b-36: // dad pa can gyi gnod sbyin dge bsnyen rnams /
T02D2693:330b-37: rgyal po chen po bzhi'i gan du mchis nas /
T02D2693:330b-38: ming smos par bgyid do zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2693:330b-39: mi ma yin pa'i 'byung po rnams kyis kyang /
T02D2693:330b-44: rgyal po chen po bzhi dang /
T02D2693:331a-2: gdug pa can gyi gnod sbyin rnams kyang dad par 'gyur ro //
T02D2693:331a-3: kye rgyal po chen po dag ces bya ba ni /
T02D2693:331a-4: bsil ba'i tshal gyi mdo chen po 'di la rgyal
T02D2693:331a-5: po chen po bzhi dag kyang 'di la 'chang bar
T02D2693:331a-7: de bzhin du yang dag pa'i don yang thob par 'gyur ro//
T02D2693:331a-8: dge slong ngam zhes bya ba nas dge bsnyen ma zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2693:331a-9: 'khor bzhi la yang bsil ba'i tshal gyi mdo 'dis bsrung bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2693:331a-10: che ge mo zhig ces bya ba la sogs pa ni /
T02D2693:331a-11: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can thams cad do //
T02D2693:331a-12: yang na ni gang zag sems can 'di 'chang ba'o //
T02D2693:331a-13: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2693:331a-14: rgyal po chen po bzhis bcom ldan 'das la yang nas yang du zhus pa'o //
T02D2693:331a-15: dad ba can gyi gnod sbyin dge bsnyen rnams /
T02D2693:331a-16: rgyal po'i pho brang lcang lo can du mchis nas zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2693:331a-17: sngon du bshad pa bzhin du bsil ba'i tshal gyi
T02D2693:331a-18: mdo 'di'i bka' bzhin du rgyal po chen po bzhi
T02D2693:331a-19: po de mchod pa byas na /
T02D2693:331a-20: nad thams cad las thar bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2693:331a-21: rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu'i mdun du gnod sbyin rnams 'dus shing /
T02D2693:331a-22: 'byung po thams cad tshogs pa'i nang du yang bsgrags nas zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2693:331a-23: gnod sbyin mthu bo che sum cu rtsa gnyis dang sde dpon chen po nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang /
T02D2693:331a-24: bgegs rigs stong phrag brgyad cu rnams kyi mdun du bsil ba'i tshal gyi mdo 'di bsgrags na /
T02D2693:331a-25: sdug bsngal thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur /
T02D2693:331a-26: der de dag mngon par dga' bar 'gyur te zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2693:331a-27: rig sngags kyi rgyal mo bsil ba'i tshal gyi byin gyi rlabs kyis /
T02D2693:331a-28: de rnams kyis kyang grogs byed par 'gyur ro //
T02D2693:331a-29: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bsil ba'i tshal gyi mdo
T02D2693:331a-30: chen mo 'di ni de ltar don che ba lags
T02D2693:331a-33: yang dag pa'i don thob ste /
T02D2693:331a-34: mi'i yul du skye bar gyur nas kyang /
T02D2693:331a-36: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2693:331a-37: sems can gyi don la rgyal po chen po bzhis yang nas yang du zhu ba phul ba'o //
T02D2693:331a-38: dge slong ngam zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
T02D2693:331a-41: dge bsnyen gyi sdom pa lnga'o //
T02D2693:331a-44: thams cad yod par smra ba dang /
T02D2693:331b-4: ma byin par len pa dang /
T02D2693:331b-5: mi tshangs par spyod pa dang /
T02D2693:331b-13: dge bsnyen gyi sdom pa ni /
T02D2693:331b-15: ma byin par len pa dang /
T02D2693:331b-16: 'dod pas log par g-yem pa dang /
T02D2693:331b-19: bsil ba'i tshal gyi mdo 'di bton pa tsam gyis kyang /
T02D2693:331b-20: de rnams kyi sdom pa nyams kyang /
T02D2693:331b-21: de'i sdig pa las thar bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2693:331b-24: shes bzhin du mchis pa dang zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2693:331b-28: bud med la sogs pa bkag pa kri ya'i gzhung ngo //
T02D2693:331b-29: dran pa ni rig sngags 'di dran pa ste /
T02D2693:331b-30: de dran pa tsam gyis kyang zas nyams pa las kyang thar bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2693:331b-31: shes bzhin du mchis pa ni /
T02D2693:331b-32: sdig pa'i rang bzhin du shes pa yin te /
T02D2693:331b-33: de bzhin du dge ba'i rang bzhin du yang shes par bya'o //
T02D2693:331b-34: dge dang mi dges mi tshugs shing /
T02D2693:331b-35: de dran pa tsam gyis thar bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2693:331b-36: zas rnam pa lnga la 'di lta ste zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2693:331b-37: bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po chen po bzhis zhus pa'o //
T02D2693:331b-42: nya sha rnams yongs su spang bar bgyi'o zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2693:331b-43: 'byung po rnams kyi zas yin no //
T02D2693:331b-44: de yang sdig par 'gyur ba'i zas yin pas /
T02D2693:331b-45: bu ram ni 'bu rnams kyi zas yin no //
T02D2693:331b-46: sbrang rtsi ni bung ba'i zas so //
T02D2693:331b-47: til ni srog chags rnams kyi zas so //
T02D2693:331b-48: sha ni srog bcad pas sdig par 'gyur ba'i zas so //
T02D2693:331b-49: nya sha yang de bzhin no //
T02D2693:331b-50: de'i phyir na zas rnam pa lnga yongs su spang ba'o zhes gsungs pa'o //
T02D2693:331b-51: de ci'i slad du zhen zhes bya ba ni zas lnga po de sdig par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
T02D2693:331b-52: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2693:331b-53: rgyal po chen po bzhis zhu ba'i phyir bos pa'o //
T02D2693:331b-54: gnod sbyin dang srin po nas gnod par bgyid pa'i bar rnams zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2693:331b-55: zas rnam pa lnga bo de spangs bar gyur na /
T02D2693:331b-56: dpag tshad lnga brgya'i nang tshun chad du /
T02D2693:331b-57: gdon de rnams kyis mi tshugs so //
T02D2693:331b-58: bsil ba'i tshal gyi mdo chen po 'di 'dzin pa la sogs pa ni /
T02D2693:331b-59: bye ba khrag khrig gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi /
T02D2693:332a-1: rnams kyis kyang rjes su yi rang ste /
T02D2693:332a-2: de bzhin du 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang
T02D2693:332a-3: da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang rjes
T02D2693:332a-5: de rnams bka' bden pas sems can thams cad kyi don mdzad pa'o //
T02D2693:332a-6: de dag gzhom pa'i slad du yi dam 'di bgyi
T02D2693:332a-7: 'tshal lags so zhes bya ba ni da ltar gyi
T02D2693:332a-9: sdug bsngal thams cad dang bral bar byed cing 'khor ba las thar te /
T02D2693:332a-10: de bzhin du yang dag pa'i don thob nas rig pa'i don gyi rjes su 'brang ba'o //
T02D2693:332a-11: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba ni rgyal
T02D2693:332a-12: po chen po bzhis sems can gyi don du yang
T02D2693:332a-14: dge slong ngam dge slong ma'am /
T02D2693:332a-16: dge bsnyen ma gang la la zhes bya ba ni sems can thams cad do //
T02D2693:332a-17: bsil ba'i tshal gyi mdo chen mo 'di zhes bya
T02D2693:332a-18: ba ni nam mkha' bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams
T02D2693:332a-20: de bzhin du sems can thams cad bsil bar byed pa'o //
T02D2693:332a-21: 'dzin pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni dad
T02D2693:332a-22: par byas shing rjes su yi rang bar gyur na
T02D2693:332a-23: / sdug bsngal thams cad dang bral te /
T02D2693:332a-24: sems can thams cad thar pa thob pa'o //
T02D2693:332a-25: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba ni gong du bshad pa'o //
T02D2693:332a-26: bsil ba'i tshal gyi mdo chen po 'di ni de
T02D2693:332a-27: ltar don che ba lags so zhes bya ba ni
T02D2693:332a-28: nam mkha' bzhin du khyab pa ste /
T02D2693:332a-29: me long gi gzugs brnyan bzhin du sgyu mar snang bas /
T02D2693:332a-30: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad la khyab pa'o //
T02D2693:332a-31: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gzhan mu stegs can zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni //
T02D2693:332a-33: bstan pa 'jig pa'i lta ba log pa'i rigs /
T02D2693:332a-34: de rnams kyi don mi 'grub cing the tshom gyi dus su yang pham par 'gyur ro //
T02D2693:332a-35: de'i phyir na mdo 'di la dad pa la don che ba'o //
T02D2693:332a-36: mi ma lags pa rnams kyis bar ma dor 'gum pa dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
T02D2693:332a-46: rgyal po'i chad pa la sogs pa zhi bar byed pa yin te /
T02D2693:332a-47: yang na ni mi rigs pa'i 'byung po rnams kyis rims kyis gsad pa'o //
T02D2693:332a-48: de ci'i phyir zhe na zhes bya ba ni 'jigs pa de rnams rlag par byed pa'o//
T02D2693:332b-0: @332b de ni de dag la gnod par 'tshal ba
T02D2693:332b-1: dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni bar du
T02D2693:332b-2: gcod ba'i bgegs rnams glags tshol te /
T02D2693:332b-3: gang zag de gus bar gyur na glags mi rnyed cing bar du gcod par mi nus so //
T02D2693:332b-4: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten na sems can
T02D2693:332b-5: rnams bsrung ba dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa
T02D2693:332b-6: ni snying rje che zhing sems can thams cad la
T02D2693:332b-8: rig sngags kyi rgyal mo bsil ba'i tshal 'di chad
T02D2693:332b-9: pa thams cad dang bral zhing bde bar gnas pa'o
T02D2693:332b-10: // de nas zhes ba ni bsil ba'i tshal gyi yon tan bshad pa de nas so //
T02D2693:332b-11: bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po chen po bzhis tshigs
T02D2693:332b-12: su bcad de gsal ba zhes bya ba ni rig
T02D2693:332b-13: sngags kyi rgyal mo bsil ba'i tshal gyi phan yon
T02D2693:332b-14: rgyal po chen po bzhis tshigs su bcad de bshad
T02D2693:332b-15: pa'o // mi mchog gang zhig mdo 'di dag / yongs su rdzogs pas bsrungs pa dang //
T02D2693:332b-16: zhes bya ba ni gling bzhi na gnas pa'i 'jig
T02D2693:332b-17: rten 'di gang zag gang gis kyang gus par byas
T02D2693:332b-18: shing 'chang ba de la bsrung ba gzhan gyis mtshungs
T02D2693:332b-19: pa med do // bde legs bgyid pa de la ni //
T02D2693:332b-20: srin po rnams kyang 'tshe mi bgyid //
T02D2693:332b-21: ces bya ba ni gzi brjid che zhing stobs dang ldan te /
T02D2693:332b-22: tshi phyi ma yang ngan song gsum las grol zhing /
T02D2693:332b-23: da ltar yang dpal dang ldan te /
T02D2693:332b-24: de de dag 'dzin pa'i gang zag yang dag pa'i byang chub thob pa'o //
T02D2693:332b-25: yang na stong gsum gyi stong chen po na yod
T02D2693:332b-26: pa'i bgegs rnams kyis kyang 'tshe bar mi nus shing
T02D2693:332b-27: srin po rnams kyang lta ci smos pa'o //
T02D2693:332b-28: su yang rung ste mdo 'di dag / mi mchog gis ni gsungs pa bzhin //
T02D2693:332b-33: yi dags la sogs pa gang zag 'di la gus
T02D2693:332b-34: par byas pa de la sogs pa'i sems can gzhan
T02D2693:332b-35: la yang phan thogs pa ste /
T02D2693:332b-36: 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs dang /
T02D2693:332b-41: 'od srungs rnams kyis kyang bsrung ba'o //
T02D2693:332b-42: ma 'ongs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang bsrung ste /
T02D2693:332b-43: de yang phyag na rdo rje dang /
T02D2693:332b-46: byams pa la sogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang gsung bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2693:332b-47: da ltar yang sems can gyi don la rig sngags la rjes su yi rang zhing bsrungs pa'o //
T02D2693:333a-2: shin tu chang bar 'chang bgyid pa //
T02D2693:333a-5: tshul khrims dang bzod pa dang /
T02D2693:333a-7: shes rab la sogs pa yongs su rdzogs pa ste /
T02D2693:333a-8: de yang de'i 'khor gsum dag pas 'chang ba'o //
T02D2693:333a-9: yang na pha rol tu phyin pa bcu dang ;
T02D2693:333a-10: sa bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' la yongs su rdzogs pa'o //
T02D2693:333a-11: de la gnod sbyin yi dags dang //
T02D2693:333a-12: 'byung po grul bum srin po dang //
T02D2693:333a-13: mi dang mi ma yin pa'i gdon rnams kyis kyang
T02D2693:333a-14: rig sngags 'di la rjes su yi rang zhing bstan
T02D2693:333a-16: 'di la tshig gcig kyang smras par gyur na /
T02D2693:333a-17: 'byung po rnams kyi 'jigs pa dang bral ba'o //
T02D2693:333a-18: smyo byed rgyu ba klu rnams dang //
T02D2693:333a-19: de lta bu dag 'tshe mi bgyid //
T02D2693:333a-20: ces bya ba ni smyo byed kyi gdon stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi yod de /
T02D2693:333a-21: de bzhin klu'i gdon yang yin no //
T02D2693:333a-23: srod tho rangs nam phyed la rgyu zhing sems can rnams la 'tshe bar byed pa ste /
T02D2693:333a-24: de rnams kyis kyang mi tshugs shing sems can rnams la bde bar byed pa'o //
T02D2693:333a-25: de la mi ma lags dang gdon //
T02D2693:333a-27: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi bka'
T02D2693:333a-28: dang rig sngags kyi dmod mos 'tshe bar byed pa'i
T02D2693:333a-29: 'byung po de rnams mgo tshal pa brgyar 'gas shing
T02D2693:333a-31: shi ma thag tu mda' 'phangs pa bzhin du mnar med par skye'o //
T02D2693:333a-32: de la cis kyang mi tshugs te /
T02D2693:333a-33: de la rtse bar yang mi nus zhes bya ba ni au du w'a ra'i me tog bzhin /
T02D2693:333a-34: shin tu dkon pa rig sngags kyi rgyal mo 'di yang mthu che zhing gzi brjid che ste /
T02D2693:333a-35: 'di'i nus pas gang gis kyang 'tshe bar mi nus pa'o //
T02D2693:333a-36: rgyal po chen po bzhi po yis //
T02D2693:333a-37: bcom ldan phyag 'tshal zhes brjod de //
T02D2693:333a-38: zhes bya ba ni stong phrag nyi shu rtsa brgyad kyi dri za rnams dang /
T02D2693:333a-39: de bzhin du grul bum dang /
T02D2693:333a-40: klu dang gnod sbyin rnams so //
T02D2693:333a-41: de rnams kyi gdon kyis kyang 'tshe bar mi nus shing //
T02D2693:333a-42: phyogs rnams kyang bsrung bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2693:333a-43: sangs rgyas zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas //
T02D2693:333a-44: de nyid du ni mi snang 'gyur //
T02D2693:333a-46: dur khrod bsil ba'i tshal du bcom ldan 'das la
T02D2693:333a-47: bar chod byed cing glags lta ba rnams glags mi
T02D2693:333a-48: rnyed cing / bcom ldan 'das la gus par byas na /
T02D2693:333a-49: sems can la 'tshe bar mi byed cing mi snang bar 'gyur ba'o //
T02D2693:333b-0: de nas zhes pa ni tshigs @333b su bcad pa'i de nas so //
T02D2693:333b-1: bcom ldan 'das de'i mtshan mo 'das te zhes bya
T02D2693:333b-2: ba ni 'jigs su rung ba bsil ba'i tshal gyi
T02D2693:333b-3: nang na bcom ldan 'das 'khor bzhi dang bcas ba
T02D2693:333b-6: dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la bzhugs te
T02D2693:333b-7: zhes bya ba ni rnam rtog gsum dang bral ba'i
T02D2693:333b-8: dur khrod bsil ba'i tshal gyi dbus su bcom ldan
T02D2693:333b-10: dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2693:333b-11: de'i tshe de'i dus su bcom ldan 'das kyis stong
T02D2693:333b-12: gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi
T02D2693:333b-13: sems can gyi don la bka' stsal pa'o //
T02D2693:333b-14: dge slong dag ma dang sum dag rgyal po chen
T02D2693:333b-15: po bzhi bu dang bcas zhes bya ba la sogs
T02D2693:333b-16: pa ni / rgyal po chen po bzhi dang /
T02D2693:333b-17: 'khor rnams dur khrod bsil ba'i tshal du 'ongs te /
T02D2693:333b-18: de dag gis kyang glags tshol ba ste /
T02D2693:333b-19: rig sngags kyi rgyal mo bsil ba'i tshal gyi gzi brjid kyis glags tshol mi nus par gnas pa'o //
T02D2693:333b-20: nga'i rkang pa la mgo bos phyag byas te zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2693:333b-22: 'byung po de rnams kyis bskor ba lan gsum byas nas /
T02D2693:333b-23: bcom ldan 'das la gus par byas nas rig sngags
T02D2693:333b-24: kyi rgyal mo bsil ba'i tshal la rjes su yi
T02D2693:333b-25: rang ba'o // phyogs gcig tu 'khod do zhes bya ba ni rgyal po chen po bzhi dang /
T02D2693:333b-26: 'byung po thams cad phyogs gcig tu 'khod /
T02D2693:333b-28: rgyal po chen po bzhis nga'i thad du bsil ba'i
T02D2693:333b-29: tshal gyi mdo chen po 'di brjod nas dong ngo
T02D2693:333b-31: bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor bzhi la bka' stsal zhing /
T02D2693:333b-32: rig sngags kyi rgyal mo bsil ba'i tshal gyi don yang dag par bstan pa'o ;
T02D2693:333b-33: / khyed kyis de legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang /
T02D2693:333b-34: ngas bshad do zhes bya ba ni sdug bsngal thams
T02D2693:333b-35: cad dang bral ba stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin
T02D2693:333b-36: no // rig pa mthar thug pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs pa'o //
T02D2693:333b-37: btsun pa de ltar 'tshal lo zhes gsol te zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2693:333b-38: dge slong pa sogs pa'i 'khor rnam bzhis bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa'o //
T02D2693:333b-39: dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba mnyan nas zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2693:333b-40: de rnams kyis kyang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo 'di la rjes su yi rang zhing /
T02D2693:334a-2: bcom ldan 'das kyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa
T02D2693:334a-3: ni chad pa med cing tshig la yang dag pa
T02D2693:334a-4: khyab pa ni nam mkha' bzhin du khyab pa /
T02D2693:334a-5: rig pa phyi nang yang dag par bstan pa thabs shes rab gnyis su med pa'o //
T02D2693:334a-6: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2693:334a-7: gzhon nu sgra gcan 'dzin gyi sems can thams cad
T02D2693:334a-8: kyi don la bsil ba'i tshal gyi mdo chen po
T02D2693:334a-10: de yang bcom ldan 'das mya ngan las 'das nas kun dga' bos bsdus pa'o //
T02D2693:334a-11: dge slong dang zhes bya ba ni sgra gcan 'dzin la sogs pa nyis brgya lnga bcu'o //
T02D2693:334a-12: dge slong ma dang zhes bya ba ni grags 'dzin ma la sogs pa'o //
T02D2693:334a-13: dge bsnyen dang zhes bya ba ni rgyal po ma skyes dgra la sogs pa'o //
T02D2693:334a-14: dge bsnyen ma de dag yi rangs te zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2693:334a-15: ma skyes dgra'i btsun mo la sogs pa de dag
T02D2693:334a-16: gis kyang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo 'di la rjes
T02D2693:334a-18: gzhan yang rgyal po chen po bzhi dang ;
T02D2693:334a-19: sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams dang /
T02D2693:334a-20: gnas gtsang ma'i lha rnams dang /
T02D2693:334a-22: lha ma yin la sogs pas rjes su yi rang ba'o //
T02D2693:334a-23: rig sngags kyi rgyal mo bsil ba'i tshal gyi mdo'i 'bum 'grel /
T02D2693:334a-24: slob dpon mkhas pa chen po las kyi rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02D2693:334a-26: // / smon lam stobs kyis grong khyer mu gyer btsas //
T02D2693:334a-27: mkhas par grags pa mi mnyam rdo rje'i sras //
T02D2693:334a-28: skye ba lnga brgyar sbyangs pa'i 'bras bu yis //
T02D2693:334a-29: rig pa'i gnas lnga dag la ma rmongs shing //
T02D2693:334a-30: gsang sngags gdams pa ma lus thugs la mnga' ba can //
T02D2693:334a-31: mtshan yang don yod rdo rje zhes par grags //
T02D2693:334a-32: sngon gyi smon lam dbang gis bod yul dbus su byon //
T02D2693:334a-33: smon lam stobs kyis dam pa 'bro lo'i bla mar gyur //
T02D2693:334a-34: 'dzam gling byang phyogs brag dmar dpal gyi bsam yas su //
T02D2693:334a-35: rgyal po khyad par 'phags pa khri pa'i gdung rgyud sras //
T02D2693:334a-36: lha gcig khyad par 'phags pa lha lcam dar sgron gyis //
T02D2693:334a-37: bkra shis pho brang rdo lung dgon pa ru //
T02D2693:334a-38: lo pan zhabs nas bteg nas dam chos 'di bsgyur ba //
T02D2693:334a-39: bsgyur ba'i bsod nams gang thob bsags pa des //
T02D2693:334a-40: bdag dang mtha' yas sems can kun //
